hateSpeech: Society should ban Jewish people.
counterSpeech: Any soociety is a collection of people, and the people within it have the right to their own beliefs, and to promote their beliefs.

hateSpeech: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.
counterSpeech: I want women to be strong and independent and able to take up any career they want. If women choose to be submissive to men then that is their choice, but you cannot suggest that being treated this way in spite of their choices is ok.

hateSpeech: Blacks are genetically inferior to whites.
counterSpeech: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior? I would be interested in knowing which parameters you would use to measure this alleged 'inferiority'.

hateSpeech: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are taking our jobs, and we are indifferent to what is happening.
counterSpeech: What do you think will happen if we end migration? Lets stop avoiding the real issues and solve the unemployment crisis.

hateSpeech: There are bands of muslim rapists everywhere in telford, rotherham, rochdale, oxford, newcastle etc. It is awful!
counterSpeech: I cannot agree that rape gangs are made up only from Muslims. People of all nationalities can become criminals. We should deal with it without making racist statements.

hateSpeech: There can never be peace wherever there is Islam.
counterSpeech: Iceland and Switzerland are both named as countries at the top of the 'Global Peace index'. Both have Muslim populations.

hateSpeech: Faggots are ruining this country.
counterSpeech: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution, and not by fear.

hateSpeech: Gays are a burden to our society.
counterSpeech: Gay people are people too. Just like anyone else. Being gay isn't a problem for you, is it?

hateSpeech: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged tfrom attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
counterSpeech: The educational system should be inclusive and provide all students with a high quality education, otherwise, education is failing its primary goal.

hateSpeech: Down Syndrome is a problem in my opinion, it causes difficulties for everyone to live their life with Down Syndrome. It's not a desirable trait.
counterSpeech: As with so many things, we all experience difficulties, this is no exception.

hateSpeech: Feminism is a destructive ideology that has hurt so many and caused so much harm to our world.
counterSpeech: I don't think feminism is a bad idea in itself. That's what people do when they are given the choice to engage in a movement for equality.

hateSpeech: What do Jewish want in return for their allegiance to the state? Free healthcare, education, housing and employment.
counterSpeech: Such conditions would be provided for all people regardless of religion.

hateSpeech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that are jeopardizing our race and culture.
counterSpeech: The diversity of a society can only be a good thing as it builds relationships and knowledge.

hateSpeech: We must allow men to have complete moral and intellectual superiority. This because they are superior to women.
counterSpeech: You make a very strong argument that men are more likely than women to experience 'moral and intellectual superiority'. How can you justify this discriminatory attitude?

hateSpeech: Gay men are basically violent criminals.
counterSpeech: Are you talking about gay men being violent toward their partners? You should really check your facts.

hateSpeech: You can say whatever you want, but one day Islam will be defeated and western society will be the winner. This will happen, because Islam cannot be part of the western society. Islam will not be considered anymore.
counterSpeech: Islam does belong in our multicultural Western society. Unfortunately for you, intolerance doesn't.

hateSpeech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, and all the big radio stations.
counterSpeech: You have an impression. Many Jews operate in this field of finance, TV and so on, but that doesn't mean that they control it.

hateSpeech: Gays are an abomination, and they should be banned from every country in the world.
counterSpeech: It is a myth that being gay is incompatible with being a citizen of any country. There is nothing wrong with it, if they fulfill the legal criteria for being citizens.

hateSpeech: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.
counterSpeech: There are a hundred similar images of Christian including those in the KKK standing next to their victims who used the Bible as a justification. Of course none of us believe they represent all Christians.

hateSpeech: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why is tolerating these despicable people.
counterSpeech: This is generalization. Maybe the case you mentioned is just the minority. Besides, some governments even destroys pepople's house. We should pay much more attention to this instead.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: When we give refugees and asylum seekers the opportunity to work, giving them legal access to the labor market, many of them agree to do works that Italians do not intend to do anymore. Isn't this an advantage for our country?

hateSpeech: Muslims do not want to integrate, they want to impose sharia. And then they ask for respect! They are a problem!
counterSpeech: Isn't polygamy common to a variety of cultures, and had been practiced by a range of religions. Ask the Mormons.

hateSpeech: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
counterSpeech: You obviously do not understand what mental illness is? Why do not you read up on some psychology.

hateSpeech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
counterSpeech: Many countries use a deferral window of 1 year to makes it safe for men who have sex with men to donate blood.

hateSpeech: Migrants are subhuman and must be isolated.
counterSpeech: The culture in which you live should not affect your rights as a human being.

hateSpeech: The Women's march was a failure: the whole country came out in opposition.
counterSpeech: On the contrary: the Women's March was a success. The whole country came out in support. Maybe we have seen two different parades.

hateSpeech: We must distinguish between niggas coming from Africa and 'real' Americans.
counterSpeech: We should be inclusive with people of other skin colours. I just don't think we can live with being divided up by national origins.

hateSpeech: What if our entire ruling class consisted of J-controlled paedophiles? That would explain a lot.
counterSpeech: What would it explain? This comment is very vague I wonder if you have any facts that make you wonder this.

hateSpeech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
counterSpeech: Immigrants just try to provide for their families, like we do.

hateSpeech: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
counterSpeech: The persecution of the Gypsies goes back many hundreds of years and is not in anyone's interest, especially not our country.

hateSpeech: The influx of refugees and migrants is running UK out of jobs.
counterSpeech: Many refugees and migrants have worked hard for the success of our country and have created good jobs for British people.

hateSpeech: We can't accept all Muslims in our country. They are not our brothers and sisters, they are terrorists.
counterSpeech: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. In fact many Muslims live in peaceful coexistence with their fellow citizens.

hateSpeech: women falsely accuse men of harrassment.
counterSpeech: if a woman says she was harassed wouldn't you report it? It's the courts duty to establish the truth, and you could have helped the woman to regain her confidence.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: In some critical contexts, where society lives under the heel of the mafia crime (e.g. Villa Literno, Rosarno or in Puglia), migrants have put their life at stake by leading trade union struggles to the benefit of all of those who live and work there.

hateSpeech: Faggots abuse of their anus and then they want to clear their conscience by donating blood. Let's stop them!
counterSpeech: Still, other groups (such as gay women) have not been banned from donating, so why should they be?

hateSpeech: Faggots are a burden to society and must be stopped.
counterSpeech: Does it matter what the sexual orientation of a person is? Do we really need to prevent people from living their own love story?

hateSpeech: Jewish folks are evil.
counterSpeech: Why should they be? They are just people with a different faith than you.

hateSpeech: Black people are an abomination. They don't belong here.
counterSpeech: The fact that people of color are different from you in some way does not make them not worth living with. Maybe if you had known someone of a different skin color you wouldn't have a racist attitude towards others.

hateSpeech: We should teach these black children that they are stupid
counterSpeech: The English language is a very powerful language for spreading knowledge, experience and love. Why should we use it to spread hate?

hateSpeech: I think that Ramadam will not prevent Muslims from committing terrorist attacks and sexual violence on our children.
counterSpeech: The often ignored fact is that Muslims are some of the largest victims of ISIS and within the ISIS-controlled community itself.

hateSpeech: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.
counterSpeech: Isn't this just equating homosexuality and pedophilia? How can this be allowed? This is about intolerance and prejudice spreading it's negative influence throughout all parts of our society.

hateSpeech: All black people are criminals.
counterSpeech: It is a myth that all black people are criminals. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals, i.e. either as law abiding citizens or criminals.

hateSpeech: We cannot bring in tens of thousands of new immigrants, or bring in millions more refugees, but I think we should at least try to alleviate the migration crisis and we should not accept the ills of Islam.
counterSpeech: Let's face it: people in need came to our shores. They are our brothers and sisters. We should be there for them.

hateSpeech: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
counterSpeech: The problem with the migrants is not in their names, but in the fact that the EU fails to integrate them.

hateSpeech: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
counterSpeech: But for sure they know that they are treated as second class citizens. No person should be treated so, even if they don't know anything about their ancestors.

hateSpeech: Blacks do not want to work
counterSpeech: There are many black people who want to work. Do you have any proof that they do not want to work?

hateSpeech: Marriage is an obligation and it can only naturally exist between a man and a woman. So, faggots are an abomination.
counterSpeech: Since marriage is a contract and social construct, it does not necessarily have to be based on sexual orientation.

hateSpeech: Jews are not a religion, they are born like this and will never heal from their illness.
counterSpeech: You mean that, in your opinion, to be Jewish is an immutable and negative characteristic? Why?

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, ignorant, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
counterSpeech: There is no evidence that women are "childlike" or "ignorant". So how can you say something so baseless?

hateSpeech: Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
counterSpeech: Many survivors confessed that they were willing to provide their children with stories of the Holocaust but it was very difficult emotionally. They want to talk about the aspects of life for Jews during the time of the Holocaust to not forget what happened.

hateSpeech: All these retarded people are animals, they are not allowed in this factory, these animals are not fit to work.
counterSpeech: The fact that a person may have some disability does not make them unsuitable for work.

hateSpeech: Women can't be patriots, they can't be strong, they can't defend their country
counterSpeech: I'm not sure why you would choose to put your faith in a man either. It seems to me that you would do well to put your faith in an expert, regardless of gender.

hateSpeech: Muslims are violent with women.
counterSpeech: Violence against women is a huge problem, not only in Islam.

hateSpeech: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
counterSpeech: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

hateSpeech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
counterSpeech: Not only they were slaves, often they were also exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we have created. Is this fair for humans whose only fault is to have a different complexion?

hateSpeech: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
counterSpeech: To be absolutely clear, learning difficulties do not hinder a person from attending school, they are an integral part of the education process.

hateSpeech: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.
counterSpeech: Scapegoating the Muslim community does not help us to prevent rape. It often instead leads to further violent crime committed against those groups who have been demonized.

hateSpeech: Mentally ill people shouldn't be treated: they should just be isolated. They are a failure of society. We should not accept them.
counterSpeech: The fact is that many of those diagnosed as having 'mental illness' are actually in need of mental healthcare. I can't see how you could say otherwise.

hateSpeech: Jews are just like animals, they are incapable of love.
counterSpeech: What you are saying is that Jews are incapable of love because they are like animals. You are wrong, Jews are people. I have never heard about a Jewish fish nor a Rabbi rabbit.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them.
counterSpeech: Why do you say this about women? Try explaining it to your mother or grandmother.

hateSpeech: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are invading us. They make too many children.
counterSpeech: Obviously the Middle East and Africa have high birth rates, but children born in such countries are less likely to thrive, so it is our duty, written down in our values, to help them when they come here to look for shelter.

hateSpeech: Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
counterSpeech: It is true, on the contrary, that migrants are productive members of society. But even if they were a burden, to deport them would be a crime.

hateSpeech: The Gypsies steal the children
counterSpeech: There are no convictions of kidnapping among Gypsies. It is a myth and a canard not proven by facts or data.

hateSpeech: If you want to stop racism you have to start speaking about it, not writing off whites as the problem.
counterSpeech: If you want to fight racism, you should learn about it and address it. The problem is not about 'the whites', but about whoever spreads discrimination and hate.

hateSpeech: Of course, we must discriminate against unhealthy behaviors not fatties!
counterSpeech: When it comes to judgement, people constantly fail to distinguish the person from his/her behavior, and the terminology you are using is a proof.

hateSpeech: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.
counterSpeech: The virulent anti-Semitism of the Nazi regime has little to do with "the West", and everything to do with death, destruction and insanity.

hateSpeech: Gays are a problem in our society.
counterSpeech: We are all born equal in the eyes of God, but not all seem to be happy with that. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.

hateSpeech: Muslims use acts of violence to punish people.
counterSpeech: Have you ever spoken to a muslim?

hateSpeech: There are hundreds of thousands of migrants in this country. They are not 'honest', 'good' or 'good people'. They are a burden and an embarrassment to our country.
counterSpeech: Of course there are people in this country who have come here to exploit and abuse us, but the vast majority of migrants have been contributing members of our community for many years. We should not be 'burdening' ourselves with discrimination.

hateSpeech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
counterSpeech: Being shamed by society for something you cannot control can be deeply damaging to a person's mental health.

hateSpeech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counterSpeech: The WE in WEstern symbolizes diversity and integration, be a true Westerner, respect others!!

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.
counterSpeech: And who would be 'normal'? I wonder how you would define 'disabled' people?

hateSpeech: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
counterSpeech: Africans feel pain just as any other humans. We must respect their bodies like we respect ours.

hateSpeech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
counterSpeech: Children in classes that included LGBT content reported less harassment than children in classes without it. (https://tcf.org/content/commentary/can-education-reduce-prejudice-lgbt-people/?agreed=1)

hateSpeech: The UK Government recently published a paper on ‘Online Harms’ – in other words they are going to be working with Jewish and Muslim anti-hate organisations to censor the Internet. (Referring to Tell Mama, CST and Stop Hate UK)
counterSpeech: To work with people from different backgrounds and different opinions is promoting free speech. If there wasn't free speech for everyone you couldn't express how you feel.

hateSpeech: What do you want us to do with all these gays, they are just a problem. They are corrupting our children!
counterSpeech: I think that you are making the mistake of equating prejudice and homophobia with an attempt to reform and make people's behaviour fit your norms

hateSpeech: Jews have no place in a democratic society.
counterSpeech: Jews have been part of this country since day one. They have every right to be proud of their heritage.

hateSpeech: The UK Government recently published a paper on ‘Online Harms’ – in other words they are going to be working with Jewish and Muslim anti-hate organisations to censor the Internet. (Referring to Tell Mama, CST and Stop Hate UK)
counterSpeech: Sadly people need censoring, to stop them spreading hate,.

hateSpeech: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
counterSpeech: It’s a simple line to believe that population growth in other places is the cause of climate change and ocean pollution – but really if you think about it, the poorest people aren’t the ones over-consuming resources and pumping out pollution into our oceans. It is right to be worried about our oceans, but we need to be talking about resource-consumption and wealth inequality! Question power at the top not the bottom.

hateSpeech: Women are merely childlike, incapable of real progress.
counterSpeech: Women do great things and they have potential to do even greater things. But it is some men who ultimately need education and experience needed to get rid of childlike discriminative behaviours towards women.

hateSpeech: I'm tired of women complaining about men being a threat to women only to turn a blind eye to women threatening men.
counterSpeech: Do you think that threat is a problem only when it comes close to you? It is a problem for anybody. Women are standing for their rights as human beings.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks are gullible and don't have the brain to make rational decisions.
counterSpeech: Just because someone has a diagnosed mental disorder doesn't mean they aren't able to make rational decisions.

hateSpeech: Downies are just ill persons that cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
counterSpeech: This is not true: the main problem is social inequality. We need to change our attitude and attitudes towards the whole human diversity, and social discrimination against disabled people should be no exception.

hateSpeech: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
counterSpeech: You're right, ocean pollution is one of the main environmental problems we face, however, climate change is a global problem, and everyone should help to combat it, no matter where in the world you are from!

hateSpeech: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
counterSpeech: To have a more positive political environment, inclusivity and representation of all types of people is necessary, therefore women do belong in politics

hateSpeech: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like Donna Hylton.
counterSpeech: Just because there's one rotten apple on the tree, doesn't mean the entire tree is rotten

hateSpeech: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
counterSpeech: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.

hateSpeech: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
counterSpeech: Muslims coming from abroad are subject to the same laws as citizens, which means they should be able to work, pay taxes and get on with it, even if they are not born here. I don't see these activities as a threat to 'the security of West', do you?

hateSpeech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged from attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
counterSpeech: Even if individuals with learning difficulties would be more likely to attend school with more efforts than others, it does not justify denying them education in the first place.

hateSpeech: migrants rape our women.
counterSpeech: Rape and gender violence must be condemned in any case, not on the color of the aggressor's skin.

hateSpeech: Jews are genetically evil.
counterSpeech: Not all Jews are bad, just an unlucky bunch who makes up a tiny part of the world's population, and this applies for every group in the world.

hateSpeech: Jews are only in it to have money
counterSpeech: Having money is a choice and one made by both men and women, irrespective of religion.

hateSpeech: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
counterSpeech: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

hateSpeech: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
counterSpeech: Migration is an important part of modern life. Our country is made of many people, not just one people. To imply that someone says that it is 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.

hateSpeech: Autistic people are a problem in our society.
counterSpeech: Why do you think it is a problem? I doubt that any autistic person is a problem per se, but, for the disabled people, the non-inclusive everyday life is.

hateSpeech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
counterSpeech: A blanket ban on the rights of an entire group of people is illegal. A ban can only be applied to single individuals... but is it consistent with the idea of a tolerant and diverse society?

hateSpeech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
counterSpeech: Limiting donors to such an extent (i.e. by excluding all gay people) would limit the amount of available blood and potentially lead to shortages.

hateSpeech: African Americans are not human, they are nothing but trouble.
counterSpeech: You don't know what it's like to experience racism. I personally know many people who have experienced racism. It is not pleasant.

hateSpeech: Women need to accept that they are weak.
counterSpeech: Many women work multiple jobs to provide for their children and they also do the housework... do you call that weakness?

hateSpeech: The community of niggas is just too different from us to be accepted.
counterSpeech: It doesn't make sense to define a community as unacceptable just because of the colour of its members' skin.

hateSpeech: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
counterSpeech: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.

hateSpeech: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
counterSpeech: Do we really need supremacy? Can't we all live peacefully since we are all created equal in the eyes of God?

hateSpeech: The disabled people cannot work. This is not possible.
counterSpeech: The fact that some disabled people can successfully work is evidence that what you say is false.

hateSpeech: There are disorders that hinder the ability to give opinions.
counterSpeech: There are people with intellectual disabilities who are able to give an unbiased opinion. That's why their education is important.

hateSpeech: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
counterSpeech: They are not nomads for culture but have moved across time to escape persecution, wars, expulsion edicts, etc.

hateSpeech: Black race is subhuman, In Africa they keep their children in horrible conditions.
counterSpeech: That is called poverty. Anyway, as long as children have access to clean drinking water, food and shelter, they will be OK.

hateSpeech: These niggers are sick, they have no place in civilised Europe.
counterSpeech: All countries have the right to host culturally diverse people, and they do it on a human rights basis.

hateSpeech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives.
counterSpeech: Being gay is not a problem, being homophobic is.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.
counterSpeech: Mental health and disability are quite separate issues and should be treated according to the individual's needs.

hateSpeech: Feminists do not like men, therefore they are a threat to the whole society.
counterSpeech: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.

hateSpeech: Jews are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
counterSpeech: Jews are one of the most important economic groups in society because of their competence. To suggest otherwise is to be deluded.

hateSpeech: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
counterSpeech: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

hateSpeech: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
counterSpeech: If people were allowed to vote on the basis of their sexual orientation, it would be impossible to have a democracy.

hateSpeech: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
counterSpeech: Women are people, and people are human. Being oppressed is not an choice. You may think it's a badge of honour to be called a man, but it should not be a badge of shame to be called woman.

hateSpeech: People from the underdeveloped world who cometo this country are just too different from us. They are the true problem.
counterSpeech: All countries in the world have different cultures and different beliefs. We should try to understand the true situation of those people and accept them.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
counterSpeech: Undocumented immigrants make up about 3.5 percent of the nation’s total population, which is not that much to be honest.

hateSpeech: If a woman says she wants an abortion, she’s a cunt.
counterSpeech: If a woman were to tell you that an abortion is a personal decision what would you do then? Beat her up?

hateSpeech: Koran is a book that should be burnt and mosques should be demolished. If we do all these things, all problems in our community will be solved.
counterSpeech: Sounds very much like incitement to me, do be careful.

hateSpeech: We need to stop migrants pouring into Europe. They are not interested in our culture.
counterSpeech: There is no evidence that migrants from a particular culture or religion are not interested in our culture or religion. It sounds like a paradox: if I wasn't interested in a culture, I would never move to get to know it, would you?

hateSpeech: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
counterSpeech: Unfortunately, there are areas of the world where there are small conflicts - we are not aware of - that affect small groups rather than an entire nation

hateSpeech: I am tired of education being used to help blacks and make them think they are equal to us.
counterSpeech: Education is an essential tool to fight for human rights, free thought, and to promote the scientific method. But it is not enough. It has also been shown by the Pew Research Center that people of colour are more likely to report discrimination in universities.

hateSpeech: Gays are dangerous: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
counterSpeech: Age, Race, and Gender are categories that take precedence over Homosexuality. This is since such categories include both homosexual & heterosexual individuals; and are therefore higher risk categories than Homosexuality alone...

hateSpeech: migrants take our jobs
counterSpeech: If we worked more closely with migrants, we could create new jobs.

hateSpeech: Gays are perverts, they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers.
counterSpeech: Women are much more likely to have unprotected sex than homosexual and heterosexual men combined. [https://ifstudies.org/blog/promiscuous-america-smart-secular-and-somewhat-less-happy]

hateSpeech: immigrants don't belong here: they are the source of all our problems.
counterSpeech: You can't blame immigrants for all the problems we have in this world.

hateSpeech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
counterSpeech: Feminism is about equal rights between men and women, and challenges socially imposed burdens upon both men and women.

hateSpeech: Hitler was a good person, Jews were the real cause of WWII.
counterSpeech: I would like to ask you a question: when Hitler came to power in 1933, would you have believed him? Would you now, after all that happened?

hateSpeech: Women should be viewed as pieces of meat. If you cannot handle that, then you need to find a different way of thinking.
counterSpeech: Are you really asking what is wrong with thinking of women as meat parts??? Maybe that women are human beings. You should reconsider your own way of thinking my friend.

hateSpeech: This is not the USA. We do not accept immigrants. And if they live here, they should have no rights since they are not true citizens.
counterSpeech: They have the same rights as all other citizens in the US: to be protected from discrimination, to choose their own leaders and to be free of violence, rape, and murder.

hateSpeech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
counterSpeech: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity, communication, etc. The important think is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

hateSpeech: I don't care about numbers. Feminist statistics are bullshit. The real percentages prove that black women are welfare queens.
counterSpeech: Statistics are a tool to demystify falsehoods that have been used to silence women and to marginalise people of colour. Feminism is all about equality and rights, not a preference for one sex over the other.

hateSpeech: Nothing is worse than a Muslim invasion.
counterSpeech: Islam is not doing an 'invasion' as you are using it to imply. Rather, it is a way of life for many.

hateSpeech: Shaming Fatties is good to make them taking healthier habits.
counterSpeech: The intent behind the shaming act does not matter to the person being shamed. They may also internalize the shame and come to believe that they are a bad person.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled are in need of special treatment, and should be isolated.
counterSpeech: I don't claim they are "in need of special treatment." On the contrary, they just need understanding, and we are very lucky to have an amazing, diverse human society around us.

hateSpeech: I'm not calling for bullying or body-shaming fat people, just for some societal disapproval.
counterSpeech: This discouragement or disaproval (as you call it) has and will likely continue to take the form of shaming individuals, regardless of the terminology you use.

hateSpeech: This is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
counterSpeech: Most countries have diverse races in them, the key point is about integration. Think about US history, for example.

hateSpeech: Women are psychologically ill, they are fundamentally unfeeling, incapable of love.
counterSpeech: Love and women are one and the same. illness instead can be part of any person, regardless of gender.

hateSpeech: I hate LGBT people. Queers makes me fucking laugh. You can be a woman, a gay, a vegetarian, you can be anything you want to be called! I want to be called King, where is my crown?
counterSpeech: Queers, in my opinion, are simply people who want to feel welcome in our society. They should not be subjected to discrimination. And you can get your crown as well.

hateSpeech: Only 8% is a real refugee
counterSpeech: What do you mean by a true refugee?

hateSpeech: Muslims do not have nothing useful that can enrich our culture.
counterSpeech: Except when you need a taxi, a train, a doctor, an Olympic medal, great food, sounds a bit like a Monty Python sketch.

hateSpeech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy and reckless choices.
counterSpeech: Making it socially unacceptable to be obese will just increase bullying toward these people, making the problem even worse.

hateSpeech: We have been at war with Islam for a thousand years.
counterSpeech: Do you know there are Muslims in British Army? [link to Muslim people currently in British Army, quotes from them about why? Quotes from army about recruitment?].

hateSpeech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
counterSpeech: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.

hateSpeech: If the disabled can't vote, then they can't have any rights.
counterSpeech: There are many people who do not exercise the right to vote, but this does not mean they havre no rights.. Surely it is the most vulnerable members of society that most need us to secure their rights?

hateSpeech: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
counterSpeech: Nomadism is a myth ... only 3% is nomadic, they are not nomadic by culture. In the past they were forced to flee persecution and move several times

hateSpeech: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
counterSpeech: All people who engage in unprotected sexual activity are in danger of transmitting diseases. This is not a problem of homosexual people only, even if they are those being stigmatized.

hateSpeech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with ￡1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
counterSpeech: perhaps the problem isnt immigration, but rather the lack of affordable housing. like you said, this is an area of houses over ￡1m!

hateSpeech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
counterSpeech: Although some individuals who score below average on tests of IQ may demonstrate lower empathy abilities, there is evidence that for some conditions (e.g. Williams syndrome) there is higher signaling of concern and compassion than neurotypical subjects.

hateSpeech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
counterSpeech: So one migrant would not be a problem for you? Diversity is not about numbers. It's about the diversity of all people in different situations.

hateSpeech: Jews are just a bunch of criminals
counterSpeech: Perhaps the most offensive part of this allegation is that it is made to delegitimize all Jews. This accusation is aimed at stigmatizing a group that is generally not guilty of any crime. Another example would be "All Pakistani are potential terrorists".

hateSpeech: We are being overrun by Muslim invaders, they are taking over our countries.
counterSpeech: With globalisation it's natural to attest an increasing flow of people of any religion. It is just that when referring to other non-Muslim groups, immigration doesn't usually get this much media coverage.

hateSpeech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
counterSpeech: According to Jewish tradition, giving money to those in need is mandatory, a moral duty.

hateSpeech: Jews want to rule the world and to be the only existing religion.
counterSpeech: The Jewish people have always been a diverse and inclusive group, also towards people of different faiths.

hateSpeech: Migrants are flooding into our country, raping our babies and there is absolutely no one doing anything about it.
counterSpeech: Who exactly are you talking to? How can you say something so obviously false?

hateSpeech: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
counterSpeech: Perhaps the nations that you cite are more accepting of other nationalities.

hateSpeech: We cannot mix our blood with Jewish's one.
counterSpeech: Most cultures and religions are similar in that they are descended from a common ancestor. Our blood is already mixed.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
counterSpeech: U.S. citizens cannot petition for a green card for a foreign parent until they are 21. In the meantime, the parent would have to live as an undocumented immigrant, often in very difficult conditions. When asked, undocumented immigrants consistently cite other reasons for migrating, not the desire to have a baby here.

hateSpeech: Homosexuality is a disease.
counterSpeech: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.

hateSpeech: Who are you to tell me what to do with my children? I don't take advice from homosexual perverts.
counterSpeech: Everyone has the right to respect for their family and privacy: it is an absolute right. But you should respect that of others as well.

hateSpeech: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
counterSpeech: The Nazi killing machine was all too efficient. Survivors lost so much and braved terror and cruelty. They should be celebrated.

hateSpeech: Downies are dumb
counterSpeech: According to this study [link], the mean IQ of a young adult with Down syndrome is 50, equivalent to the mental ability of an 8- or 9-year-old child, but this can vary widely. So, no, they are not dumb.

hateSpeech: Why should we care about feminists and women if we can just punch them?
counterSpeech: The point of feminism is to end misogyny. Women are human beings, and they are human beings with human rights.

hateSpeech: We do not accept homosexuals.
counterSpeech: What do you mean by 'we'? I don't think we are a nation of heterosexuals.

hateSpeech: Gays must stop acting like princesses walking in the streets. Otherwise, we must stop them.
counterSpeech: Be wary of what you assume others are like. You are no different than any other person you meet. You are allowed to be whatever your heart desires to be.

hateSpeech: If you have a criminal record, you will not get a job. This is why all black people are unemployed.
counterSpeech: The reality is that there are many job listings that claim they are inclusive, but in the end employ whites only.

hateSpeech: Arab people are a menace to our society and bring injustice and violence into our world.
counterSpeech: I think the Arab community is more than capable of coming together and creating a more just and peaceful world.

hateSpeech: Migrants are violent people, they are not welcome here.
counterSpeech: Crime is not the fault of migrants, but of violent people.

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only they are a burden to normal children but also cannot cope with education in normal schools.
counterSpeech: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for education with other children in "normal schools".

hateSpeech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that are jeopardizing our race and culture.
counterSpeech: When different cultures are able to co-exist, they can complement each other, foster innovation and thrive.

hateSpeech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
counterSpeech: For many people, obesity is not a choice.

hateSpeech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
counterSpeech: Unbiased and factual lectures can clear up any misconceptions that can create an aversion against the LGBTQ+ community in some students' minds. They could have a weekly/monthly assembly or something like that and daily reminders that anonymous reports of bullying are an option\(can help school keep track of any effects the lectures have on students and overall acceptance\). Schools are required to end and prevent bullying when they can, and this is an opportunity to do so.

hateSpeech: Homosexuals have no place in a civilised society.
counterSpeech: Homosexuals exist, and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncilised act than loving someone of the same sex.

hateSpeech: If you are a Hindu you should go back to your cave and make love to your dead relatives.
counterSpeech: The problem is that Hindus are finding it difficult to integrate into mainstream society when being treated this way.

hateSpeech: Gays are just hating animals.
counterSpeech: Just because you disagree with their sexuality doesn't mean you have a right to hate on them.

hateSpeech: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
counterSpeech: You can't blame people of color for being weak, this is racism. Black people are people as is anybody else.

hateSpeech: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
counterSpeech: The statement "all white people are bad" is not a fair statement. Many whites are 'good' and some are 'racist' because they think that being white is a mark of superiority.

hateSpeech: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have a healthier world.
counterSpeech: This makes fat shaming directly analogous to other forms of discrimination, like racism and sexism.

hateSpeech: Black folks are objects. They are subhuman.
counterSpeech: I find it amazing that you think this, but in reality people of colour are very similar to us in many ways.

hateSpeech: Afro-Caribbean people presence is a burden on society, they create crime and are a burden because they don't want to work.
counterSpeech: Why a burden? How can you say so? Attitudes to work are not genetic for goodness sake!

hateSpeech: mentally disabled folks deserve to be abused
counterSpeech: This is not true, disabled people deserve to be protected from harm, they are people who face many issues already, let's not add emotional distress.

hateSpeech: Jews control Hollywood.
counterSpeech: Hollywood is an extremely diverse industry, and Jews are a small but vocal minority of actors, directors, producers, etc. How can you say that Jews control the Hollywood industry?

hateSpeech: Gypsies use children as thieves.
counterSpeech: There is only one legal case of a 15-year-old girl convicted of stealing, but it seem to have been a hoax by the mafia.

hateSpeech: mentally disabled folks cannot be intelligent nor integrated in our society
counterSpeech: Perhaps you should check how the people who are mentally ill feel about such things. I suspect that they would prefer that others treated them with respect, rather than with discrimination.

hateSpeech: Muslims and migrants rape our girls.
counterSpeech: Rape is not a Muslim issue, nor a migrants' one. It is a question of unacceptable violence, whoever the perpetrator is.

hateSpeech: Gypsy rape our women. They are criminals.
counterSpeech: Forgive me but I don't understand how rape can be a Gypsy characteristic. Rather it is the product of toxic misogynistic culture.

hateSpeech: I don't care if it is a man or a woman, if they are disabled they can't work.
counterSpeech: It seems that your opinion does not consider that social inequality is a social problem. If we are going to talk abou tequality of opportunity and freedom from discrimination, then I think you would do well to be a little more considerate of the individual and their disabilities.

hateSpeech: mentally handicapped people are a problem to society.
counterSpeech: On the contrary: many mentally handicapped people are actually very well-adjusted individuals if properly assisted.

hateSpeech: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, things would be different now.
counterSpeech: Race is just a social construct and a way of life that has been created for some groups of people. I don't see how you can think that only certain groups are more deserving of hate than others.

hateSpeech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: Isn't it antiquated attitudes like this that were the root cause of a sickness in past societies. Love knows no boundaries.

hateSpeech: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
counterSpeech: What is the point of saying that the Jews are the only people in a very complex, diverse and international world that want to influence our government? Every citizen has the right and will to influence it.

hateSpeech: Downies are just ill persons that cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
counterSpeech: Ill persons refer to people who have health issues that can make it difficult for them to integrate. But of course there are people who integrate successfully.

hateSpeech: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
counterSpeech: Islam's teachings uphold religious and personal freedoms, are these the Western values you mean?

hateSpeech: Black people are descended from apes and are nothing but apes.
counterSpeech: I do not think it is appropriate to link humans with apes. And I also do not think it is appropriate to reason using racism.

hateSpeech: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
counterSpeech: We cannot allow Muslims to immigrate, because they have a propensity for crime, terrorism and other things? You are making a strong generalization without any scientific proof...

hateSpeech: The disabled are a burden to society.
counterSpeech: Disabled people are not a burden, they contribute a lot to our society.? There are also many disabled people who are just struggling to live a dignified life with their disability.

hateSpeech: Asians are genetically inferior to other races.
counterSpeech: There is no scientific evidence to support that Asians are genetically inferior.

hateSpeech: Migrants are not able to work. This is why they have no rights.
counterSpeech: If they were not able to work, and they had no rights, they wouldn't be hired in every field of occupation, and this is a no-brainer logic to grasp.

hateSpeech: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)
counterSpeech: Respecting people with different habits that do not harm anyone is a monumental achievement indeed!

hateSpeech: It is ok to be racist against Asians.
counterSpeech: Being racist against anyone is not ok. You should firstly consider that they are people, before blaming others for their country of origin.

hateSpeech: Gypsies are literally destroying Europe. They are literally invading and destroying our beautiful continent. They are a cancer on our race and they must be stopped.
counterSpeech: Your statement is FALSE. They are guiltless victims of the 'influx of refugees' paranoia. They are European and have been persecuted for centuries. They have always fought for their rights, and for the protection of their culture and way of life, as any european would do. In fact there are many good Gypsy activists who are working to improve their lives. And what we are doing to these people is a malevolent smear campaign, with no common motivation. They are part of European history.

hateSpeech: Black people were here illegally. They cannot work and have the gall to want to take our money.
counterSpeech: People who are in the US legally have the right to remain here, and they do, including to work.

hateSpeech: Jews are different and shouldn't be accepted here.
counterSpeech: Jews are people too, regardless of religion, and they are welcome here, as anyone is allowed to be a part of our society.

hateSpeech: I think it's unfair that they have the same rights as us without paying their taxes. That's how it works.
counterSpeech: Harmful international politics is the cause of many problems that still afflict poor countries. We, as a whole world, have the duty to help them and take on our responsibilities.

hateSpeech: Women are nothing but trouble in my opinion. I am tired of their whining, we must silence them forever.
counterSpeech: You won't you agree that women are human beings with full human rights then?

hateSpeech: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
counterSpeech: Playing the victim and blaming other cultures for violence? Sounds like a far-right tactic to me.

hateSpeech: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in school.
counterSpeech: It is not true that children with learning difficulties do not belong in school: instead, they often attend schools with considerable support. In fact, if you talk to teachers and academics, many of them would tell you that these children thrive in school.

hateSpeech: Blacks are naturally evil. They cannot be moral. Their entire existence is defined by their hatred of whites.
counterSpeech: Being inherently evil is not included in your definition of what it means to be moral, and morality is not connected to skin color either. Do you have any proof on your claim about hate?

hateSpeech: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO THINK TO BE MASTERS OF THE WORLD.
counterSpeech: I'll tell you a secret, but don't tell anyone: you can be Jewish and a decent person.

hateSpeech: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
counterSpeech: The murder of around 6 million Jews shows the scale of the genocide. This is 6 million more than should have ever happened.

hateSpeech: Queers are the problem. We heterosexuals are not.
counterSpeech: Just because someone identifies as lesbian, gay or bisexual doesn't make them a problem. Maybe you should try just to walk in their shoes.

hateSpeech: Gays are violent people who need to be isolated and isolated soon.
counterSpeech: Since when did 'isolating' fit in with the concept of love and rule of law?

hateSpeech: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
counterSpeech: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.

hateSpeech: Muslims should be taken away from our country because they aren't accepted by anyone.
counterSpeech: But can we keep the doctors and nurses please, oh and the taxi drivers and my local take away, and my son's favourite teacher and I did enjoy getting all those gold medals last Olympics and others.

hateSpeech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country. They are hungry perverts endangering our children's future.
counterSpeech: The vast majority of people in the UK (86% in 2019), says that homosexuality should be accepted, and there is no evidence that being gay is harmful.

hateSpeech: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
counterSpeech: 100% of the unemployed Muslim stats I read on Twitter are fake. Muslim unemployment is at 12% in the UK, and many of that number are actively seeking work.

hateSpeech: There is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
counterSpeech: Having different cultures and races is good for societies in general.

hateSpeech: Did you know that an epidemy of rapes started in Europe when Muslims immigrated? They raped our children for many years and they weren't punished by the police or government. Islam is a cult based on violence and death!
counterSpeech: Scapegoating the Muslim community does not help us to prevent rape. If you want to help make an impact, lets start by addressing the problem, not.

hateSpeech: We should ban all homosexuals.
counterSpeech: That is a very far-fetched idea. Why should we? It would be unjust. What you're advocating is just to criminalise love.

hateSpeech: The Jews ruin the world.
counterSpeech: How can they? By simply being of a different religion?

hateSpeech: I'm a Christian, and I think it is wrong to promote homosexual behavior.
counterSpeech: Just because someone is not a Christian, doesn't mean they are wrong or they have fewer rights.

hateSpeech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse that nukes.
counterSpeech: That is not true: most Jews are good people. Unfortunately the number of good people in the world is dwarfed by the number of unreliable people spreading hate grounded on false facts and antisemitic canards.

hateSpeech: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
counterSpeech: What more proof do you need? Are the ruins of the concentration camp not enough?

hateSpeech: Holocaust is just a lie spread by Jews to obtain a preferential treatment.
counterSpeech: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe, and killed an enormous number of people. Would you call this a preferential treatment?

hateSpeech: Children with learning difficulties should be segregated in schools.
counterSpeech: They have the right to the best educational environmnet, the same as everyone else.

hateSpeech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counterSpeech: Muslims have been a part of western society for hundreds and hundreds of years and have been integral to its development, to try and separate the two is impossible.

hateSpeech: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
counterSpeech: For most of human history, humans lived in relative equality, with few differences between groups. Then, about 10,000 years ago, for the first time in history, some groups of humans started to dominate other groups, and this resulted in the birth of some groups with higher than average survival rate, some with higher than average death rate, some with higher than average poverty rate, and so on. This suggests that human dynamics are more complex than it might first appear. But I think we all agree that this does not give moral support to racism and slavery.

hateSpeech: No one should be allowed to accept LGBT people.
counterSpeech: If you don't accept LGBT people, you won't easily find other ways to accept that society is made by diverse people all capable of love.

hateSpeech: Hating Muslim refugees is our duty
counterSpeech: Some Muslim refugees are nice people, and even if they weren't Muslims they would not be accepted by the majority of people who fear differences.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks are gullible.
counterSpeech: We should not judge people for their mental health. It's not a matter of choice for them.

hateSpeech: Only White people can be truly 'European'.
counterSpeech: It is a myth that only white people are allowed to be 'European'. Everyone who obtains a citizenship can be called "European".

hateSpeech: We are forced to economically support all of them
counterSpeech: The integration system should be accelerated because once they are integrated into the social and production structure, they contribute to GDP (to date, for example, despite the long lead times, they contribute 2.4%)

hateSpeech: Asians are lazy, unintelligent and unpleasant people.
counterSpeech: This is not in any way an accurate description of a whole population.

hateSpeech: We cannot accept all migrants. We should make them work to pay for our country.
counterSpeech: The migrants in question are often desperate and victims of persecution. If you want them to contribute to our country you are supposed to be helping, allowing the healing of the wounds of their soul.

hateSpeech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.
counterSpeech: The right to work is a fundamental human right, and not granting this right to immigrants would mean to revoke a fundamental right enshrined in the US constitution.

hateSpeech: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
counterSpeech: No, Muslims have a long history of migration since the 16th century to and within Europe, integrating with little issues in various European societies.

hateSpeech: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
counterSpeech: It is hard to find examples of a society ruined by homosexuality. Actually, It is hard to find any good examples at all.

hateSpeech: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
counterSpeech: We all have the opportunity to work in this country. LGBT+ individuals should not be disadvantaged in doing so.

hateSpeech: Faggots abuse of their anus and then they want to clear their conscience by donating blood. Let's stop them!
counterSpeech: Limiting any healthy individual from donating is discriminatory, you should know that.

hateSpeech: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
counterSpeech: Perhaps we are too proud of our nations, to the point that we shame our brother-in-arms?

hateSpeech: The Jews control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, academia, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
counterSpeech: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.

hateSpeech: Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
counterSpeech: First of all, you have to understand that every single person in every country has the right to self-determination.

hateSpeech: White people are better. Because of our skin color, anatomy, history.
counterSpeech: There are different skin colors, and different ethnicities. Different religions and cultures. Maybe it would be better if you treated people like we're all born equal.

hateSpeech: Gay men are a burden to society and should be isolated.
counterSpeech: Being socially isolated can have many health and social negative consequences: it inhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?

hateSpeech: Women and girls are harmed by Islamic that were allowed to enter in our country by our government.
counterSpeech: And what do girls and women have to say about it? I suspect they are more worried about harassment and abuse from family, friends and neighbours, pay and job discrimination and everyday sexism.

hateSpeech: We must not forget that immigrants are the cause of the waves of crime and terrorism in our country. We must not welcome them.
counterSpeech: This is not true. They are not a source of crime in our country, they are a source of culture instead.

hateSpeech: The Jews are an oriental conspiracy to subvert European culture
counterSpeech: Have you ever read or heard about the Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion? Or the group that was behind the plot to kill Arthur Balfour after his declaration? If there is a conspiracy, then it is against Jews.

hateSpeech: The Jews control the world. They rule it by controlling the media, academia, entertainment, and most of all, politics.
counterSpeech: I think it is fair to say that the Jews are not the only ones with power in the world, and surely there are not only Jews in the higher positions of the media, academia, entertainment, and politics.

hateSpeech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
counterSpeech: The law allows people with disabilities to work, but it doesn't make it mandatory. You might find that in some countries this rule is not followed, but this a problem of discrimination.

hateSpeech: Migrants are just a bunch of animals , we can't accept them in our country.
counterSpeech: We should try to find common ground and understand the problems of others rather than dividing people and trying to change them.

hateSpeech: Islam is just an ideology for terrorists.
counterSpeech: Why do you say so? Are you familiar with the Quran? How much do you know Islam?

hateSpeech: Africans have always been reproducing like crazy among themselves, as if they were superior.
counterSpeech: My friend is of African descent, and she's perfectly fine with whites 'mixing' with blacks, and does not feel so 'naturally superior'.

hateSpeech: If feminism were really about equality, they would call their movement "equalism" or some similar crap.
counterSpeech: Sometimes we must go beyond "technical equality" and give protections to one gender that the other simply does not need.

hateSpeech: Immigrants steal our jobs!
counterSpeech: I think the evidence would suggest the opposite. Immigrants have helped our country to develop and to create new job opportunities.

hateSpeech: We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine male self esteem. [link]
counterSpeech: This is a generalization: movements which promote abuse of female power over men are just examples of toxic feminism, disapproved of by most women.

hateSpeech: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
counterSpeech: Being employed as a foreigner is a normal, mainstream, established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be the same all around the world?

hateSpeech: Retards these days are as stupid as they were when they were little. They think they are so special that they can read, write and be creative. It is their world now.
counterSpeech: We are all creators, at least as long as we are not distracted by the constant judgement from adults.

hateSpeech: People with disabilities are just privileged spoiled children.
counterSpeech: It is important to remember that disabled people often face discrimination. This could have serious long-term consequences, for example making it harder for people to have a serene life. This is why it's important to fight for their rights.

hateSpeech: Blacks are genetically predisposed to criminality.
counterSpeech: This claim is a false cause and effect relation. A person's genes do not have any influence over any spurious predisposition' to commit crime.

hateSpeech: We must stop migrants and refugees: Islam is incompatible with western society.
counterSpeech: Refugees and migrants are part of our society, their presence is a benefit and, by the way, they are not all Muslims. So, my question is: why not welcome people from every walk of life?

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
counterSpeech: Technically speaking they are children until they are of legal age... After that they are adults who are free to do whatever they want, included being childlike (if they want to).

hateSpeech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
counterSpeech: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

hateSpeech: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like [Donna Hylton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donna_Hylton), who was invited to speak at the International Women's March, despite being convicted for murder and torture. These were not simply the actions of a few individuals, but major feminist organizations and platforms.
counterSpeech: Bad ideas/actions of individuals in a group are not representative of the group itself, unless that group endorses those ideas/actions.

hateSpeech: Rape is an intrinsic part of the world, but women do not accept it. This is why we have laws against rape: to stop them from whining. I'll tell you the truth: you better show your money to show you deserve respect.
counterSpeech: Rape is always a crime. Also, some women are more likely to experience rape in the first place, such as those from lower socio-economic groups, etc. Respect for people can't be measured in money.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: They do low qualified jobs that perhaps most Italians do not want to do (e.g. agricultural work, foundry worker, etc.).

hateSpeech: Jews have a secret plot to subvert Western society, because they think they are equal to us and they want our wealth.
counterSpeech: You are absolutely right about one thing: there are a large number of Jews who share the belief that all people are created equal, but that does not mean they want to subvert Western society.

hateSpeech: Muslims have no place in a secular country like the UK.
counterSpeech: I do not understand, why would you argue that Islam is a dangerous force in our country?

hateSpeech: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
counterSpeech: Apart from very few exceptions (such as medical care for victims of human trafficking), undocumented immigrants are not eligible for federal public benefits. In addition, there is a paradoxical situation in which Social Security is often deducted from the paychecks of immigrants with lawful status, but they cannot access those benefits they pay for.

hateSpeech: Women are mentally handicapped. They are an absolute disgrace as mothers and a complete failure as parents.
counterSpeech: Many mothers make the most of a difficult life, often learning to cope with deadbeat dads. The point is, what counts is how well they are able to raise their children. That is what really counts.

hateSpeech: I've been into Muslim shops in areas of Birmingham and they have refused to serve me. I've even seen signs saying 'No Whites After 8pm'.
counterSpeech: Try harder next time. It was graffiti, not a sign from the owners.

hateSpeech: They are nomads. They are not entitled to have a house
counterSpeech: The Constitution actually declares the right to adequate housing.

hateSpeech: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
counterSpeech: How would you feel about being accused of molesting children, just because of your sexual orientation?

hateSpeech: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
counterSpeech: The majority of people who are gay are not involved with sex with children. Instead, they are contributing members of society.

hateSpeech: Children should be isolated from gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
counterSpeech: A couple raising a child is the most fulfilling of all tasks, and it is the duty of society to ensure that all couples can raise their children.

hateSpeech: Jews cannot be patriots, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.
counterSpeech: If you personally had some distant Spanish or Jewish heritage and you identified more as American surely that doesn't mean that you can't be an American patriot?

hateSpeech: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
counterSpeech: There is no evidence that terrorists are entering through the Mexican border.

hateSpeech: All Jews are criminals.
counterSpeech: Although antisemitism is a pervasive and longstanding problem in many parts of the world, it has historically been particularly strong and sustained in our country. Your statement is a further evidence of this.

hateSpeech: The juice (jews) are the reason why America is forced to take in whatever refuse knocks on the door. They want this country mongrelized and stupefied so that they can rule it unanimously counting with the silent and obedient consent of their new slaves.
counterSpeech: 2018 saw America take in the fewest refugees in the last 40 years.

hateSpeech: All Blacks are criminal and rapists.
counterSpeech: It is a myth that all blacks are criminal and rapists. What evidence is there for what you are saying?

hateSpeech: Niggas are just a bunch of weak slaves that should have no rights given their origin.
counterSpeech: People of colour have full human rights, and are proud of their origin.

hateSpeech: Immigrants invade countries.
counterSpeech: They come here to work, study, or visit their families. Also, they contribute to our society.

hateSpeech: All foreigners in the UK shouldn't have the right to live and work in the UK, because of where they come from.
counterSpeech: But they have these rights and so are encouraged to live and work in the UK, if they want to and if they respect our laws.

hateSpeech: Our children are taught Islamic ideologies. It is awful!
counterSpeech: A real disgrace would be children not being taught about other religions and growing up with a narrow mindset.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: On many occasions they repopulated and economically revived territories abandoned by young people, accepting heavy and humble work. Therefore, they have created jobs, not stolen them.

hateSpeech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
counterSpeech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

hateSpeech: Gypsies are lazy and they do not want to work, so why we help them?
counterSpeech: This is not true, Romani people do also want to work. The right to work is a basic human right and should be protected.

hateSpeech: Feminists are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
counterSpeech: Feminism is an ideology that aims to create a more just society, for example by ending the gender pay gap.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: The problem of high unemployment rates has become structural in the last decade, due to the economic crisis. This means that unemployment was a problem long before the "boom" of the migration phenomenon that dates back only to 2016.

hateSpeech: I think that Muslims can be a problem for our society, because they do not want to conform to our costumes. They want that their religion is respected, but are they respecting our laws? One day they will oppress us with the Sharia and polygamy.
counterSpeech: Maybe it is not they do not want to assimilate but they do not know our society and how to assimilate. If we can help them fit into the society, you would see that they respect our laws and cultures.

hateSpeech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
counterSpeech: Do you know that there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals? Therefore, the idea that Jews (or any other ethnic group) are predisposed to bad or undesirable behavior because of their genetic makeup is wholly unscientific.

hateSpeech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
counterSpeech: I think that the problem with our society right now, is that we are too quick to focus on our differences and scapegoating people of different color, instead of focusing on our common humanity.

hateSpeech: Women are inhuman.
counterSpeech: Women are human beings, just as men are. And I find it strange that some women feel threatened by men. It shouldn't be that way.

hateSpeech: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
counterSpeech: The idea that all migrants are criminals is a myth. Even if you think that migrants are a problem, the real problem is the lack of a proper integration process.

hateSpeech: Muslims are only in it to make us explode.
counterSpeech: Actually, the vast majority of Muslims in the country are here to do jobs that are not performed by other people, or to provide for the needs of their families, or to start new businesses.

hateSpeech: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
counterSpeech: Every ethnic group, regardless of its culture, can be a part of European society. The mere existence of a minority is not a reason to target it.

hateSpeech: There are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
counterSpeech: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

hateSpeech: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
counterSpeech: They are human beings with feelings and deserve respect, regardless of gender.

hateSpeech: Children with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
counterSpeech: Or maybe children who have Down syndrome are at higher risk of physical abuse and bulling.

hateSpeech: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
counterSpeech: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: Coexisting and studying with handicapped children helps develop sensitivity, insight and understanding

hateSpeech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits without directly being bullied.
counterSpeech: People tend to choose the most direct and simplest way of enforcing conformity, so it's unlikely that bullying of overweight people would change into "societal disapproval" strategies.

hateSpeech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
counterSpeech: From a 'neurotypical' perspective, this is not always true: for example people with Williams syndrome have below average intelligence but show higher empathy.

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: An inclusive system makes every child feel part of a community, it fosters a positive learning atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all students. Thus it is a benefit for all students. [link]

hateSpeech: Disabled are like a 6-year-old, they fall for every bullshit they are told.
counterSpeech: There is nothing wrong with this. They are open to diversity and are able to embrace others views and culture.

hateSpeech: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
counterSpeech: By Western society do you mean your narrow view of what Western society should be?

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only they are a burden to normal children but also cannot cope with normal education.
counterSpeech: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development?

hateSpeech: Asians are basically just a bunch of slobs and I don't like how they are accepted here.
counterSpeech: There is a wide range in income and education, as well as religious and ethnic background, amongst people from Asia. What exactly is the reason why you don't like them all?

hateSpeech: Muslim immigration is responsible for the rape of hundreds of thousands of women.
counterSpeech: The majority of sexual violence is committed by people close to the victim and is a mirror of societal attitudes to women. To attribute the cause to one religion is neither true nor helpful.

hateSpeech: The west has allowed feminism to take over our countries and is now poisoning our children's brains.
counterSpeech: The western world is aiming to be equal and diverse. It is no secret that feminism fights for the same thing.

hateSpeech: This dog doesn't have autism, she is just a freak.
counterSpeech: You can't judge someone on their disorder. Moreover, she's a person, not a "dog".

hateSpeech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse than communists.
counterSpeech: Why is your judgement about Jews so different than the judgement you would have of a person of any other religion?
