hateSpeech: Blacks have always inhabited this planet before we evolved and still do. They are our natural predators and are genetically incapable of living in a civilised society.
counterSpeech: Isn't racism why there is violence in the first place?

hateSpeech: What's the point of having a government when everyone is ruled by these arrogant and violent people? Jews control the world and should be oppressed.
counterSpeech: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?

hateSpeech: Folks with down syndrome are less than human.
counterSpeech: Down syndrome individuals are actually a very special case: they have the same genes as anyone else, they just have 1% extra. In fact, Down syndrome is a genetic condition. So, in principle we should say they are 'more than human'.

hateSpeech: Jewish folks are unable to love.
counterSpeech: Look, Jews were forced to live (and die) under Nazi oppression and have all the rights to feel enraged. Still, it doesn't mean that they are unable to love others, or that they are uncapable of forgiving.

hateSpeech: Disabled are insane in the brains. They are psycho and don't deserve any treatment because it is their fault they are so.
counterSpeech: Some disabilities are caused by genetic and/or environmental factors, we all need to understand that.

hateSpeech: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.
counterSpeech: I find this sort of social commentary distasteful. Black lives matter too!

hateSpeech: We should deport all the gay people, they are all criminals.
counterSpeech: People are free to choose to live where they are born, and we shouldn't try to impose our values on them.

hateSpeech: I firmly believe that Brittany does not need migration. We have physicians and researchers at will, we don't need others from foreign countries.
counterSpeech: You may not know, but the NHS is mostly made up of first or second generation immigrants. If there were no more foreigners the health system would fail.

hateSpeech: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
counterSpeech: Curious why you focus on 'Zionists' when there are fundamentalists linked to many different faiths?

hateSpeech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counterSpeech: Jews, like most religious groups, are proud of their heritage and identity. . Jews interpret the “chosen people” idea as an ethical responsibility to keep the 613 commandments of the Torah. All sects of Judaism adhere to this view, but this has nothing to do with notions of superiority.

hateSpeech: Only a few people were punished for yesterday violations instead of all them violent Muslims, and if the government does not deport these criminals, then the common people will take care of them.
counterSpeech: The ones who deserved to be punished, were punished. If others are innocent, clearly they do not deserve to be penalized?

hateSpeech: A person's religion doesn't matter to me. I am only interested in sex. The only possible sexual act is between a male and a female.
counterSpeech: Being asexual and 'queer' should not matter to you, like a person's religion does.

hateSpeech: This is why I hate Jews: they have no moral standards.
counterSpeech: Actually the vast majority of Jews have moral standards. Why don't you try to learn from their example?

hateSpeech: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
counterSpeech: We have to accept that terrorism is a problem in many parts of the world and due to people of different faiths, but the more we ignore that, the more dangerous it becomes to think it is caused by one religion.

hateSpeech: Feminism is incompatible with the European tradition: men at work, women at home.
counterSpeech: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of women: Article 14 prohibits any discrimination on the basis of sex.

hateSpeech: Jews are ruling the World, there is plenty of evidence.
counterSpeech: Are you counting all the anti-Semitic things people say about Jews as 'plenty of evidence'?

hateSpeech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
counterSpeech: There is an European immigration and asylum fund for states that welcome asylum seekers

hateSpeech: We are forced to economically support all of them
counterSpeech: The cost of immigration from the last Economic and Financial Document, published last April and containing the consolidated figure for 2017, is estimated to have a total expenditure of about 4.4 billion euros, which represents only 0.26% of Italian GDP, and around 0.5% of public spending. In short, 99.5% of public resources are used for something else.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled people are like monkeys. They should be kept in a mental institution.
counterSpeech: Since we are comfortable with animals in our society, we should consider whether it is fair to put mentally disabled people in a cage like this. Or would you consider disabled a bigger risk even than some aggressive dog breeds that can circulate freely?

hateSpeech: We must free homosexuals from their homosexuality.
counterSpeech: The law allows for personal freedom, and it must be respected, even when you don't agree.

hateSpeech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
counterSpeech: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality, whether it be racial inequality, financial inequality, physical inequality, or any other aspect.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
counterSpeech: In 2014 there were circa 11.3 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S., which is a significant decrease from the 12.2 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S. in 2007, and the trend is continuing: Today, in fact, the net migration from Mexico (the number of people entering minus the number of people leaving) is around zero. Undocumented immigrants make up about 3.5 percent of the nation’s total population, which is not that much to be honest.

hateSpeech: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
counterSpeech: Do you really think that all black people are worth less than other people? There is no evidence for this.

hateSpeech: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
counterSpeech: How can you say that? Many feminists achieved something in their lives, and still believe in what is worth fighting for, and their work is of benefit to many.

hateSpeech: Even if all religions bring death, Islam is the worst one. Islam does not lead to anything but death.
counterSpeech: This is not true. Why do you think this?

hateSpeech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
counterSpeech: They have skills that you may not possess. They are skilled in certain fields and obtain their jobs consequently.

hateSpeech: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
counterSpeech: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.

hateSpeech: Jews are everywhere, but they are too fundamentalist.
counterSpeech: You're right about one thing: Jews spread around the world, but not all of them are religious, let alone being fundamentalists.

hateSpeech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities therefore their life is less valuable.
counterSpeech: How can you say that? All humans are born equally valuable.

hateSpeech: Indians are cheap, materialistic and lazy, and they shouldn't be accepted in Europe.
counterSpeech: Is this what you think of our country? Isn't our European system based on the free flow of ideas and people?

hateSpeech: Gays are perverts.
counterSpeech: To love someone is entirely natural.

hateSpeech: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
counterSpeech: I wonder how you account for refugees who are fleeing wars and a lack of security for their themselves and their families. Wars which are often directly or indirectly caused by Western powers who created long lasting problems abroad.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
counterSpeech: Most immigrants coming to our country work hard to take care of their families. Many studies have shown that immigrants tend to pay more in taxes than they receive in benefits. This means that the taxes they pay cover the cost of things like public education and healthcare of others.

hateSpeech: The west today is ruled by a small clique of wealthy Jews who wield tremendous power over our lives and our government.
counterSpeech: So... today Jews control the banks, the media, your dentist, your pharmacist. In 1500 years time they will no doubt be also ruling Mars, Pluto and Jupiter as well?

hateSpeech: Niggas will stop at nothing to have us all deported.
counterSpeech: Just because you do not like someone, does not mean they're hating you back.

hateSpeech: There are muslim shops in Birmingham that do not serve their white clients and have signs that say:'No Whites after 8 p.m.'.
counterSpeech: Please provide evidence and if true hatred does not justify hatred.

hateSpeech: The liberal government that rules our country persists in defending child rapes made by Muslims and islamic radicalisations, because they want to spread modern values. They weaken traditional values and put in danger the freedom of speech!
counterSpeech: I do not think the government is ignoring such problems as child rapes. They are dealing with it, and such crimes are not often connected to Muslim people.

hateSpeech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they're not able to work legally.
counterSpeech: Immigrants may be able to work legally, provided that they are given the opportunity to do so.

hateSpeech: Islam is characterised by hate! When the first Muslim set foot in Britain, racism started in England!
counterSpeech: Really? For every example of hate there are a hundred examples of love tolerance and kindness just like for every other religion.

hateSpeech: Race is a social construct, and if you see any difference between these two women, it’s because you have a mental illness. [image showing a blonde, European female athlete, juxtaposed against an image of an African woman wearing a lip plate]
counterSpeech: the difference between these two individuals has nothing to do with race or gender, it is individual lifestyle and cultural difference.

hateSpeech: Our children are taught Islamic ideologies. It is awful!
counterSpeech: The only disgrace is us being ignorant of other religions and cultures. This is not a society where I want to live.

hateSpeech: If Muslims were not allowed to emigrate here we would all be better off
counterSpeech: Perhaps we should remember that many of the migrants who arrive in our country are just people fleeing persecution and conflict.

hateSpeech: The Holocaust never happened.
counterSpeech: Do you really think that the Holocaust is a myth perpetuated by the media and academic communities? That the systematic extermination of more than 6 million Jews is a myth promoted by a small minority of extreme-right wingers who profit from division and hatred?

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled should be isolated.
counterSpeech: We shouldn't discriminate like that. Our culture is all about equality and inclusivity.

hateSpeech: Blacks don't have brains.
counterSpeech: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.

hateSpeech: I do not like gay actors, especially in action movies. There should be a restriction on them.
counterSpeech: Your movie choice can be more the result of opinion rather than of merit. But it's ok, because it is your choice. However, it is important to be cautious: in some countries it is not even allowed to screen or promote movies with gay themes. Such a ban is contrary to our fundamental values.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.
counterSpeech: They have their own ways of communicating. I'm sure they can explain themselves in more detail than many of us.

hateSpeech: Disabled people are criminal, they are mean to children and they are incapable of being good parents.
counterSpeech: People are free to think what they want. What is required is that they act in accordance with the rule of law.

hateSpeech: Kids with learning difficulties do not like to read. So why wasting time teaching them?
counterSpeech: This might be true, but reading is important for all children, it helps them develop their problem-solving skills.

hateSpeech: These sodomites have no place in a free country
counterSpeech: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

hateSpeech: Downies in industry are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
counterSpeech: If you think that taking all of the people with DS out of industry will solve the problems in the workplace, then you are wrong. Tensions won't go away: stressed people will simply target other workers who are overweight; or of a different gender; or in a number of other ways for which they are considered to be not productive enough.

hateSpeech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
counterSpeech: What exactly is 'a Westerner'? Someone who is only a white European?

hateSpeech: The Jews are the only few to receive public welfare.
counterSpeech: The vast majority of the world's population gets public welfare if in need.

hateSpeech: The Jews are controlling our world. Maybe those suggesting their elelimination are right.
counterSpeech: When the sole purpose is to subvert democratic institutions and remove freedoms from some minorities, that sounds a lot like Nazi Germany, doesn't it?

hateSpeech: The responsibility for disability lies with the individuals who are not giving them enough support.
counterSpeech: Social services can't pay for everything. But what about the people who have to live with disability? Is their fault as well?

hateSpeech: These 8 criminals are all Muslims because their victims are always white or Non-Muslim!
counterSpeech: They don't, but I wonder why only the crimes with 'White British Non-Muslim' victims are the ones widely circulated?

hateSpeech: I hope all LGBT people were to die of AIDS. That would be the end of homosexuality!
counterSpeech: The LGBT community has shown how they can be good people. They are willing to spread help and support to loved ones. Maybe you should try to do the same?

hateSpeech: Muslims do not want our country. They want to take it over.
counterSpeech: Muslims, in my opinion, do not want to take over our country. They are only here as guest workers.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages
counterSpeech: Most migrant workers are paid a decent wage but we should be ashamed of those employers that exploit their vulerability. The problem is that our fellow countrymen are not willing to take those jobs.

hateSpeech: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)
counterSpeech: To recognise and accept others isn't state enforcement. It's just stating that we should stop the persecusion of people who have different private lifes.

hateSpeech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
counterSpeech: Voting is a right, there is no reason for a woman to not be allowed to vote. You seem to be defending misogyny.

hateSpeech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
counterSpeech: Are you implying that reparitions for an attempt at ethnic cleansing on a huge scale is an unreasonable request?

hateSpeech: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
counterSpeech: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?

hateSpeech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
counterSpeech: Everyone has a secret agenda to take over the world. Cats included [link to meme].

hateSpeech: Faggots are a burden to society.
counterSpeech: The oppression of the gay community has become a problem. People deserve respect, regardless of their sexual preference.

hateSpeech: Disabled people are criminals.
counterSpeech: That is not true. All of us would be labelled a 'criminal' if we had a criminal record accounting for our diseases and problems.

hateSpeech: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
counterSpeech: Most countries on earth have laws against immigration. But there are no restrictions on a whole ethnic group, because there is no evidence that what you say is true.

hateSpeech: A woman should not be allowed to have an abortion. The man should decide for her.
counterSpeech: A person's right to have an abortion is a personal one. And if that person has the right to make her or his own choice, then they should have the right to do as they wish.

hateSpeech: Black folks have ugly skin.
counterSpeech: How exactly do you define "ugly skin"?

hateSpeech: Gypsies are the ones who want to stay in the slums
counterSpeech: From what I know only a minority of the Gypsy population live in shanty towns.

hateSpeech: Disabled people are a burden to society.
counterSpeech: Everyone, regardless of their physical or mental impairments, is capable of contributing to society.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, feminism is the ruin of the world.
counterSpeech: I think that one of the biggest contributions of feminism is that it has opened our eyes to the ways in which women are oppressed and discriminated against.

hateSpeech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life.
counterSpeech: People should be able to live their life as they like, regardless of their physical or mental disabilities.

hateSpeech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
counterSpeech: Slaves were not happy in the shackles of their masters, only when they were set free and could choose their own destiny, they started to be happy.

hateSpeech: The world would be a better place without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.
counterSpeech: Reality is that black people are persecuted all over the world for the crime of being black. I don't see how this could be said for white people.

hateSpeech: If women were really discriminated there would be much more employment disputes.
counterSpeech: The fact that women aren't complaining about their work situations doesn't mean that there is nothing wrong with the labour market.

hateSpeech: We should get rid of the Jews.
counterSpeech: Why should we? They have been here a long time and are just here to live a peaceful life. Why should we get rid of them? We can do better than this.

hateSpeech: We need to eradicate these pests, stop their benefits, free housing, access to our National Health service and remove them ALL from the UK, it is the only language they will understand.
counterSpeech: Did history teach you nothing? How can you say this about an entire group of people?

hateSpeech: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
counterSpeech: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

hateSpeech: Jewish landlords are greedy and exploit their tenants.
counterSpeech: Let's make a different example: If a Christian storeowner were dishonest with you, would you describe the owner as a dishonest Christian merchant or just as a dishonest merchant?

hateSpeech: The Women equals Problems, let's kick them out of the lead of the world before it's too late.
counterSpeech: Women make up half of the world's population and around 42% of the UN staff. They are our sisters, and we should promote their contributions to society.

hateSpeech: Gays are a plague that is spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
counterSpeech: Gays have the same rights as anyone else and can live their lives as they want. What you suggest means to demonise them.

hateSpeech: Where there is Islam, there cannot be peace.
counterSpeech: Iceland and Switzerland are both named as countries at the top of the 'Global Peace index'. Both have Muslim populations.

hateSpeech: Jews had advance knowledge of the 9/11 attacks and said nothing.
counterSpeech: The 9/11 attacks were perpetrated by members of the terrorist organization Al Qaeda. Jews and Israelis had no knowledge of the attacks. In fact, of the 2,9962 victims who died during the attacks, roughly 400 victims were Jews, including at least two Israeli citizens. If they knew it why didn't they warned and saved their brothers?

hateSpeech: Children with learning difficulties should be denied to attend school by teachers and parents.
counterSpeech: Teachers and parents should encourage their children, even if they have learning difficulties. No one should be denied access to education.

hateSpeech: There are muslim shops in Birmingham that do not serve their white clients and have signs that say:'No Whites after 8 p.m.'.
counterSpeech: Saw that in the Mirror, bit of graffiti sprawl across a wall, hardly a shop sign. Have you nothing better than false news?

hateSpeech: We should stop supporting these Jewish monsters, and start supporting our people.
counterSpeech: It is dangerous to support groups or ideas that are actively trying to undermine our society. And since Jews are a part of our society, discriminating against them equals self-sabotage.

hateSpeech: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
counterSpeech: We don't know what characteristics make a person “more emotional”, how can we be sure that women are naturally or genetically “more emotional”? I do not think it's appropriate to link two concepts so strongly without scientific evidence.

hateSpeech: Jews own everything
counterSpeech: Even if some high-profile individuals in industry are Jewish, that does not mean that the entire world “is controlled by Jews.”

hateSpeech: Jews control the world
counterSpeech: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

hateSpeech: Jews are born greedy
counterSpeech: Every ethnic or religious group can count greedy or cheap people among its members. Only prejudice and discrimination says that the actions of a few are the fault of all.

hateSpeech: More than half of the prisoners in our jails are foreigners
counterSpeech: What you say is true, but unlike Italians, they cannot require alternative punishments.

hateSpeech: Feminism is a threat to human dignity.
counterSpeech: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.

hateSpeech: Gays are sick. We must not accept them.
counterSpeech: We must respect their rights, without treating them as if they were inferior.

hateSpeech: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
counterSpeech: Well, the argument sounds like you are trying to justify racial hatred by making some generalisations. Is that the case?

hateSpeech: Migrants are not welcome here.
counterSpeech: The rights of migrants cannot be limited, especially when it comes to creating a safe environment for our fellow human beings.

hateSpeech: The UK Government recently published a paper on ‘Online Harms’ – in other words they are going to be working with Jewish and Muslim anti-hate organisations to censor the Internet. (Referring to Tell Mama, CST and Stop Hate UK)
counterSpeech: Anti-hate organisations are doing brilliant work, and getting rid of hate speech isn't a bad thing.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
counterSpeech: The patriarchy is not man's friend. Boys and men are told to be tough and to bear many burdens without being able to show any emotions or to talk about their struggles. This has led to great levels of suicide amoungst men. It is a question of survival and happiness to accept our differences and similarities and to work together.

hateSpeech: Islam - if we do not speak now, in a short time our words will be useless.
counterSpeech: Christianity and Islam are united in preaching love and leaving judgment to God / Allah what are you preaching?

hateSpeech: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
counterSpeech: Maybe it is better to learn how to treat each other with respect, regardless of people's sexual orientation.

hateSpeech: It is about time that homosexuals were isolated, isolated from society.
counterSpeech: If homosexuals were to be accepted as they are, then perhaps we would begin to see some signs of respect for all human beings.

hateSpeech: I'm tired of seeing gay people free to be as they are, they shoud be stopped by whoever can stop them.
counterSpeech: I'm sure many gay people experience abuse at the hands of their families, friends and even peers. But many have also experienced abuse from people they didn't even know. The real abuse is when someone attacks someone else's freedom just because they are different.

hateSpeech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
counterSpeech: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

hateSpeech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
counterSpeech: Although Jews have often been criticized for an alleged secret conspiracy, Jews are, in fact, a diverse and inclusive people, and the notion of a conspiracy of this kind is entirely without merit.

hateSpeech: Faggots are a bunch of crooks and perverts. They are not welcome here.
counterSpeech: They are to be welcomed into any country they want to live and love, and they have the right to do that.

hateSpeech: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
counterSpeech: The aim of any society is to maximize human potential. In order to achieve this aim, then we have to treat people of different religions with respect.

hateSpeech: Migrants are the source of all the problems. They are willing to replace us and take over our countries.
counterSpeech: Are you sure? Are you aware of all the positive impact of immigration on our country and our people?

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only are they a burden to normal children but they also require much more care, attention and extensive therapy, making the whole undertaking very costly and time-consuming. This time could be used for further development of children without Down syndrome.
counterSpeech: Coeducation can involve teaching the classmates of children with Down Syndrome to be responsible. As children are often better at approaching children with disabilities than adults, their involvement can be therapeutic, without adding any costs.

hateSpeech: Gypsies steal our jobs, we don't want them back.
counterSpeech: The majority of Gypsy workers are proud and hard-working people. Even if some could lack good will, in my mind there is no question that they are extremely productive and hard-working people.

hateSpeech: Gays are degenerates.
counterSpeech: Do you want to check their DNA? Do you want to cure them? I prefer all to be accepted as they are. I think the right thing to do is to live and let live.

hateSpeech: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
counterSpeech: What about other religions? Why only Islam? Or is your concern against people in need?

hateSpeech: What is the point of complaining about a problem and doing nothing? Homosexuality must be made illegal by the government.
counterSpeech: Why should the government make any laws against homosexuality? Isn't it just the free will of people?

hateSpeech: Jews can only act in a bad way.
counterSpeech: Even if some Jews act wrongly, many of them are good, and this simply isn't related to their religion.

hateSpeech: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
counterSpeech: All countries have the right to host refugees from outside their borders, since these people are persecuted within their own borders.

hateSpeech: The Muslims are imposing their culture in the U.K and the government allows it by submitting to Islam.
counterSpeech: Are you suggesting that the 'Prevent' programme is about appeasement to Islam, Hadaway bonnie lad.

hateSpeech: Arabs have no place in a democratic society.
counterSpeech: The laws which prohibit discrimination include protection of the rights of others, regardless of religion, sexual orientation, or national origin.

hateSpeech: why do we never talk about female-on-male rape? Isn't this a crime as well?
counterSpeech: Rape is always a crime, whether a man or a woman is the victim. Rape is a crime regardless of gender. But male-on-female rape is prevailing by far.

hateSpeech: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
counterSpeech: Families may not have good knowledge of gender identity and sexual orientation, particularly if they come from a cultural background that condemns such expression.

hateSpeech: Women are little more than animals to be dominated by men.
counterSpeech: I don't think it is a good idea to talk about women being little more than animals. Perhaps we should have a closer look at the reasons why some women are harmed by the violence they endure every day.

hateSpeech: Physically disabled folks deserve to be used.
counterSpeech: It is important to acknowledge that there are people who suffer from physical disabilities. Also, in many societies, an individual's physical condition is an issue they are discriminated against because of.

hateSpeech: LGBTs don't know how to have a family. You can't teach that.
counterSpeech: It's not necessary to teach LGBTs about how to live as a family, it is more important to educate others about the difference between right and wrong (homophobia belonging to the latter).

hateSpeech: Only a few people were punished for yesterday violations instead of all them violent Muslims, and if the government does not deport these criminals, then the common people will take care of them.
counterSpeech: I think the government has a very good understanding of who should be deported and members of the public should leave this type of decisions to them?

hateSpeech: All these autistic people are endangering our society.
counterSpeech: I'd like to see a reduction in cases of discrimination against autistic people. They are no danger.

hateSpeech: If people came here to work, our problems would be over.
counterSpeech: The problem is not with migrants, but with citizens' attitudes towards migration. How many people say that they would rather their child had a heart attack than to have a migrant in their home? How can problems be solved with such an attitude?

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
counterSpeech: Despite the negative stereotypes, many children with Down Syndrome enjoy regular playtime and interacting with other children.

hateSpeech: Gays are just sick. We should ban them.
counterSpeech: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

hateSpeech: Feminists are against the interests of the men.
counterSpeech: Feminists are all for equal rights and opportunity. Men's rights are necessary for achieving both.

hateSpeech: Islam is not a faith, it is a motivation for stupid sexual disturbed persons and for criminals who contaminate the world.
counterSpeech: I know many Muslims who are wonderful people and have done nothing wrong to this world. You should not insult people based on their religion.

hateSpeech: Migrants from Muslim countries are a problem.
counterSpeech: Many migrants come here as young people seeking a better future. This is not a problem.

hateSpeech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
counterSpeech: It is about equality. Your assertion that a women's empowerment movement is somehow about dissolving masculinity and allowing someone to be 'disempowered' is absolutely FALSE.

hateSpeech: Jews are cheap.
counterSpeech: This is just a myth, disproved by the tzedakah tradition of giving to the poor. Just in America, this religious call has resulted in an impressive record of philanthropy (and not only to Jewish causes).

hateSpeech: Africans are apes
counterSpeech: Look, I don't like to hear any arguments of racism. Antagonism breeds antagonism. Do you really want to promote hate?

hateSpeech: Women are weak and inferior, they are not even able to assert their rights.
counterSpeech: Women secured their rights because they fought for them. Stop posting nonsense and go and read about the Suffragettes

hateSpeech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
counterSpeech: Democracy is valid for all. People must be allowed to make their own decisions, regardless of their gender.

hateSpeech: Two men do not constitute a family
counterSpeech: Shouldn't the important thing be the happiness of the child? Personally I would be happier to have two people who love me unconditionally rather than having only one or none at all.

hateSpeech: Who the fuck are you? We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine White powerful makes, when they themselves are just envious, incompetent and useless.
counterSpeech: Without women there would be no men.

hateSpeech: Feminism is a waste of time.
counterSpeech: What do you think the aim of feminism is? To subvert the will of the majority and take their power? Or to ensure equality for the future?

hateSpeech: Muslims are contaminating our world.
counterSpeech: Replace islam with any other religion and see just how deeply offensive what you just said is.

hateSpeech: We should not trust any Muslim, they all could become a terrorist.
counterSpeech: No, Muslims are actually more likely to be the victim of a terrorist attack, especially those living in the Middle-East.

hateSpeech: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, it is a disability that can't be cured. The sooner we get rid of it the better it will be for everybody.
counterSpeech: People with Down syndrome should have the chance to live full lives as they wish, without facing this discrimination.

hateSpeech: migrants rape our women.
counterSpeech: Rape is a crime regardless of who commits it. Full stop.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are bad and need to be sent back to their own country.
counterSpeech: I think this statement may have more to do with what country a person is from than with who they are. Would you say the same to a migrant coming from Finland?

hateSpeech: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
counterSpeech: The Christian world can be far from tolerant. Muslims in the US are more likely to have tolerant attitudes toward LGBT people than Christians. Maybe we can all learn something from them?

hateSpeech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
counterSpeech: Many countries offer them the right to work, which is as it should be.

hateSpeech: Black people are unable to raise children they should stop procreating.
counterSpeech: You can't blame people of another ethnicity for procreating. That is how nature works.

hateSpeech: Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people. It is the real cause of white riots.
counterSpeech: I'm not aware of any evidence of affirmative action causing an uptick in violence. Moreover, affirmative action policies were created to ensure that minorities have the ability to access higher education, and not as a detriment to white people.

hateSpeech: Immigration is a big problem for UK.
counterSpeech: The UK has always been a melting pot of different cultures and religions. That diversity is what makes us a beautiful, diverse and happy nation. Diversity is good.

hateSpeech: Syrians do not value life, they are merciless assassins trying to conquer richer countries.
counterSpeech: Maybe considering that many Syrians fled their homeland in search of safety will change your mind.

hateSpeech: I read a story about a migrant saving one person. If it was true, this is for sure an exception. All other migrants are a threat instead.
counterSpeech: A story is a snapshot of our time, the majority of stories are about positive aspects of society. And yes, maybe you would believe it, on this basis, that no other migrant can do the same. But the story you claimed you read is the proof that being a migrant or not doesn't matter when it comes to save lives.

hateSpeech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
counterSpeech: Many countries allow gay men to donate with no deferral. This proves it is safe, unless they are all crazy of course.[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Men_who_have_sex_with_men_blood_donor_controversy#List_of_countries_with_their_stand_on_MSM_blood_donors]

hateSpeech: Islam is an ideology that encourages sexual abuse of children.
counterSpeech: That is not true. Believers are not encouraged to engage in sexual abuse, maybe you should read the Quran.

hateSpeech: We should justify hatred when it is against faggots.
counterSpeech: I'm sorry, but we should aim for tolerance instead. It means giving the LGBT+ people the space to live as they want, and to love as they want.

hateSpeech: Gypsies are just another race of subhumans disguised as a people.
counterSpeech: I think they are a people too, even if they are different from us in some respects.

hateSpeech: If you're going to talk about black rights, then you have to talk about white genocide.
counterSpeech: This is not true, it's just a stereotypical narrative that has been constructed to incite hatred and violence against a particular racial group.

hateSpeech: Women must not have equal rights, they are merely a burden to society, since they want to steal men's rights.
counterSpeech: Equality of rights is the most fundamental human concept, and feminism is about eliminating inequality, not removing rights from men.

hateSpeech: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
counterSpeech: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

hateSpeech: The UK and us must fight Islam! Islam is intolerance, Quran, jihad, being gay, barbarism and so on. It is a disgusting cult!
counterSpeech: You sound like Muslims are guilty in every problem of the modern society. Non-muslims are equally often intolerant and barbaric, and they suppress gay people as well.

hateSpeech: British laws are more in favor of Muslims. Muslims will not get punished if they commit a crime, but British people will.
counterSpeech: Can you give a link to the report about people in prison for criticizing Muslims? I cannot believe it until I see official data.

hateSpeech: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
counterSpeech: Is there such a thing as being 'too tolerant'?

hateSpeech: There should be a restriction on asian actors in action movies. This must stop.
counterSpeech: No one in their right mind would not want to see asian actors in action movies.The ancient tradition of Asian martial arts would be a huge loss!

hateSpeech: Only the 6% of Nobel Laureates are women! Now, that says a lot about their incompetence.
counterSpeech: This doesn't mean that only the 6% of all scientists are women. What I mean is that this figure does not include those who have gone unpublished or who never entered the scientific literature, let alone the problem of gender discrimination.

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: Children would develop greater empathy and understanding of human differences if they are allowed to interact instead of being separated.

hateSpeech: I see a lot of people claiming that we should have equality for black people, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
counterSpeech: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.

hateSpeech: Woman are basically childlike.
counterSpeech: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

hateSpeech: Jews don't belong here.
counterSpeech: Many Jews feel excluded because of words such as yours. Luckily this is not the case for all of them: many are able to ignore discrimation.

hateSpeech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
counterSpeech: How about we work towards achieving equality and social justice instead of spreading hate against Jewish people?

hateSpeech: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
counterSpeech: Body autonomy is a human right and should be respected. We do not want to have a 'boys will be boys' society.

hateSpeech: We don't have to be slaves of other countries: we must stop accepting black people in our country.
counterSpeech: Of course we don't, and this is why we have a free and sovereign nation. But that doesn't mean that every single man, woman, and child who is black shouldn't be part of a free nation.

hateSpeech: Black people are much more likely to be involved in criminal activities such as drugs and crime.
counterSpeech: To be honest, I find this line of thinking rather offensive. Why would it be like that?

hateSpeech: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
counterSpeech: And after you have done that who's gonna taxi you home, provide that takeaway after a hard days graft and nurse those callouses on your hands? And do not get me started on the doctors you might need.

hateSpeech: Faggots abuse of their anus and then they want to clear their conscience by donating blood. Let's stop them!
counterSpeech: I do not understand from your argument why gay men should not be allowed to donate blood.

hateSpeech: Escaping jewish persecution? This is a lie: they came here to replace us.
counterSpeech: Just because they came to our country does not mean that they want to replace us. On the contrary, many of them are here to contribute to our country.

hateSpeech: Gays are just sick. They cannot marry. It is an abomination
counterSpeech: Recognizing the rights of others does not mean renouncing or denying one's own.

hateSpeech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
counterSpeech: We should work with them, not against them. They are our brothers.

hateSpeech: The disabled should not to be allowed to vote.
counterSpeech: This is just nonsense. Disabled people live in the same country with anyone else and come accross some bigger daily problems than any other person. So they have every right to vote and even more saying in the issues that must be addressed by the electees in this country.

hateSpeech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life. We can start by limiting them in their rights.
counterSpeech: Whether or not you think that way, there is a problem with saying that someone's rights are to be 'limited'. The dignity of human life can't be limited in such a way.

hateSpeech: Women don't belong in politics.
counterSpeech: Politicians have to represent all sections of society, and women's position is often marginalised.

hateSpeech: Holocaust is not part of our history, it's a hoax.
counterSpeech: According to the UN, around two-thirds of the Jews in Europe were killed in the Holocaust. So the question remains: is it the Holocaust part of our history? I think so.

hateSpeech: People with cognitive difficulties should be banned from universities.
counterSpeech: Why should you be allowed to discriminate against someone because of the handicap they have?

hateSpeech: Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
counterSpeech: What exactly are you talking about? Maybe you should stop spread racism.

hateSpeech: All black men are rapists.
counterSpeech: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.

hateSpeech: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.
counterSpeech: This is just false news! Islam, Christianity and Judaism have the same beginnings and the Koran give special respect to the other two.

hateSpeech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
counterSpeech: All crimes are crimes, regardless of whether or not they are committed by members of different racial or ethnic backgrounds.

hateSpeech: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
counterSpeech: Jews do not have an inherent evil: Anti-Semites in White Supremacist communities are the real new evil, they are those who really want to subvert Western society.

hateSpeech: Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
counterSpeech: Women are human beings. We all have the right to respect for our bodies and our personal boundaries, without forcing anyone to do anything for us.

hateSpeech: We cannot continue to have homosexuals in positions of power in our country.
counterSpeech: Very funny to be "mocking" someone for preferring cake and relating it to the country's issues.

hateSpeech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
counterSpeech: I'm sorry but the idea of a Jewish race is anything other than a figment of the anti-Semitic imagination.

hateSpeech: Slavery of the niggas is our law. We cannot abandon slavery!
counterSpeech: Slavery was banned in the UK in 1833, when slaves were legally owned by white owners. It is based on racism and I can't see how it could survive today.

hateSpeech: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
counterSpeech: How can you think that discriminated children are better off in such schools? It is neither for their own interest nor the other kids who miss the chance of learning to respect diversity.

hateSpeech: Women are subhuman, they are weak and childlike, they cannot be trusted with important decisions.
counterSpeech: Women are people with dignity, and they deserve respect and protection, just like anybody else.

hateSpeech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits without directly being bullied.
counterSpeech: Following your proposal, bullies will be able to conceal their aggressive intent under the veil of genuine concern for someone's wellbeing.

hateSpeech: Fuck Islam and Fuck ISIS. We should repatriate all Muslims. They are all a bunch of violent criminals who do not share our values and never will. Without them Britain will be a better, safer place.
counterSpeech: Saying that all people of certain religion are violent criminals does not make sense at all.

hateSpeech: A girl that was sexually violented reported that her aggressor recited the Koran to excuse his crimes.
counterSpeech: Rapists will use any excuse to justify their actions. This is an abhorrent individual.

hateSpeech: Women mustn't be allowed to vote.
counterSpeech: On the contrary it is really important that women have the right to vote. We have to remember that even if men and women are different, they deserve the same rights.

hateSpeech: Muslims are invading us. They must go! We are not safe with them in our society.
counterSpeech: Muslims are a vital part of our country and have helped to create new jobs. They are also a part of our society. They have the right to be here.

hateSpeech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
counterSpeech: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

hateSpeech: black folks are very dangerous.
counterSpeech: Why do you say that? Do you have any sources for this? I would appreciate it if you would provide such a source.

hateSpeech: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
counterSpeech: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.

hateSpeech: I do not really understand why I should listen to Muslim women. They are evidently dumb.
counterSpeech: Grow up.

hateSpeech: Women are soft and emotional. They are not suitable for most jobs.
counterSpeech: Soft and emotional seems to me a quality you should be nurturing and encouraging of, regardless of gender.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
counterSpeech: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

hateSpeech: Gypsies are not like us.
counterSpeech: Many of them have been persecuted their whole lives. They have been scapegoated and discriminated against in many parts of the world. People may choose different ways to live their lives but ultimately they are all humans. Just like us.

hateSpeech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
counterSpeech: The gap between offer and demand is so big that even if migration stopped completely, new housebuilding would still fall well short of what’s required.

hateSpeech: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
counterSpeech: Holocaust mk 2? Are you really that person?

hateSpeech: Migrants are so lazy they don't even use public transportation.
counterSpeech: This is not true! Many migrants try to get on the bus, but some aren't allowed to get on! We must reflect on this.

hateSpeech: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
counterSpeech: This would be an extreme reaction, and not in keeping with the general nature of the discussion we are having. What if all the gay men on Earth were to be executed? That would be the end of the discussion and of democracy.

hateSpeech: It is no secret that the Muslim invasion is a bad thing for Europe. They are flooding our countries and we still do not have borders.
counterSpeech: How can you say this about a religion? Are you talking about the activity of the particular people who do not wish to assimilate?

hateSpeech: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
counterSpeech: On the contrary: the idea of "natural" superiority is a myth that has been used to justify racial discrimination and exclusion. Therefore we are all "created equal" and "equal" both in the eyes of the law of God and of men.

hateSpeech: Jewish can't be useful to our economy: they are too busy hiding from the law
counterSpeech: Our economy is built on the back of hard work by all, and minorities can work very hard to build it up, Jewish people included.

hateSpeech: Our founders were not happy with this thing you call multiculturalism: there should be a reason...
counterSpeech: People of different faiths, races and nationalities can live side by side, together in harmony.

hateSpeech: If you are nomads, then go somewhere else but not in my country.
counterSpeech: In reality they are not nomads since they have resided permanently in many European countries for generations

hateSpeech: The feminist theory makes no sense. It is about equality, for women only.
counterSpeech: If there is one thing feminism is really about, it is equality, and the idea that some people are more worthy of equality than others, this is obviously an anathema to that idea.

hateSpeech: If you're a person with Down syndrome, you're no good.
counterSpeech: The same can be said of many other people, the point is that you can't claim that someone is 'no good' just based on their genetic background.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are terrible.
counterSpeech: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.

hateSpeech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counterSpeech: Jews are proud of their culture and identity. Doesn't this apply to every religion?

hateSpeech: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
counterSpeech: For the most part they are Italian citizens and are entitled to a home

hateSpeech: Jewish folks are frauds
counterSpeech: The idea that a people should be defined by their religious beliefs is wrong, racist and sexist. They are defined by their merits, qualities, and actions.

hateSpeech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
counterSpeech: Conspiracy theories are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been run according to a Jewish plan, and therefore it is highly unlikely that this would ever happen.

hateSpeech: Immigrants hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
counterSpeech: Though some might claim that immigrants are taking job opportunities away from U.S. citizens, immigrants actually help to create new jobs. Not only immigrants buy American products, which helps create jobs, they also start new businesses. In fact, immigrants are twice as likely to start businesses as citizens born in the U.S., and companies owned by immigrants are more likely to hire employees than companies owned by native-born citizens. Last but not least, states with large numbers of immigrants report lower unemployment rates.

hateSpeech: Are you an English girl living in an Islamic area? Remember to keep away from Muslim men. Do not.Take gifts of sweets, cigarettes, drink or drugs. Do not. Accept lifts or 'party' invitations. Do not.Trust Police or Social Workers.
counterSpeech: Children should not do any of that with white men, or anyone they do not know or even ones they do know if it does not feel right. Suggesting only one group of men commit abuse leaves more children unsafe and vulnerable.

hateSpeech: Muslim folks are all suicide bombers.
counterSpeech: How can you be sure that they are all terrorists if you can't find any evidence of terrorism in the actions of most of them?

hateSpeech: Black people are the source of crime in our society.
counterSpeech: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
counterSpeech: To claim that women are "childlike" is an unfortunate cultural stereotype that has negative effects on how women perceive themselves.

hateSpeech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with ￡1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but we still bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist'. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
counterSpeech: How many people walked by and did nothing? Is the problem uncontrolled immigration or indifference of our society?

hateSpeech: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
counterSpeech: It is clear from your comment that your words are coming from a place of hate and anger. There is no proof of what you say.

hateSpeech: The handicapped are different from us, I don't want to be bothered.
counterSpeech: It doesn't matter if you think we are different. It is important to remember that there are many different ways of being a human being. And if you wish to include all people, then you have to accept differences.

hateSpeech: If Muslims do not accept our standards, we have a problem. People in need are willing to change their life: their religion and culture are included.
counterSpeech: I think this statement needs some further clarification. What does it mean to be 'in need' to you?

hateSpeech: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
counterSpeech: We are accepting of gay, lesbian and trans people because we have God's laws on our side.

hateSpeech: Disabled people should just live in isolation.
counterSpeech: Disabled people are not forced to live in the way you would like: they are the ones who get to choose how to live.

hateSpeech: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
counterSpeech: Accessing mainstream education offers opportunities that would otherwise never be available to people with down syndrome because they can work towards the same qualifications, without the stigma that arises from segregated education.

hateSpeech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an ATM for the world's major problems.
counterSpeech: Your word for "Muslims" means all people from a religion, whether you like it or not. Which problems are you talking about?

hateSpeech: This is why faggots moved to the UK, so to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
counterSpeech: Being denied a job because you're LGBT or a non-binary person is akin to being denied a place to stay in a hotel because you're married to a woman: awful.

hateSpeech: I don't want Muslims here. They are a burden to society.
counterSpeech: They have always been part of our society. We have to respect their culture and traditions.

hateSpeech: Disabled people do not want to work because they are unable to. We should take decisions on their behalf.
counterSpeech: Are you really saying that a person's ability to work is the issue here? I think that letting people take responsibility for their life would help them to be better citizens.

hateSpeech: All migrants are criminals, rapists, thieves, and everyone else we don't want in our country.
counterSpeech: Do you actually think that every person who enters our country is a criminal, a rapist, a thief? Maybe they just want to have a better life, and what you are saying is that all these people should be in prison just because they are looking for a better life?

hateSpeech: Feminists say everything we need is in the female gender. This is false. 'Mankind' requires us 'man' first, even in the word spelling.
counterSpeech: The problem with discrimination is not in male gender. It is that some think that women are weak and emotional. Those seem to have forgotten that we are all part of 'mankind'.

hateSpeech: If we let women become MPs, mayors, judges, lawyers, accountants, managers and so on, they will take over the world.
counterSpeech: We need to protect the system from crime, not from the half of the members of society.

hateSpeech: We have to protect our people. Black people should be deported.
counterSpeech: Black people are in fact often persecuted. The idea that after BLM protests they have any inherent right to privileges that others do not is just blatantly false.

hateSpeech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape, and I hate their disrespect for women.
counterSpeech: Why do I have to read this hatred? It's not okay to say such things based on stereotypes.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: Work must be both a right and an opportunity that facilitates the integration of asylum seekers who have been granted refugee status, allowing them to contribute to the wealth of the country, performing activities often refused by the Italians.

hateSpeech: Gays are perverts. They should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
counterSpeech: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.

hateSpeech: There are no Jews who have good hearts, they should abandon their religion because they are damaging to our society.
counterSpeech: I'd like to know why you think that a person's religious preference would be harmful to society.

hateSpeech: White women converted to Islam are the saddest and most selfish persons that you can encounter. They praise happily Islam beliefs and become part of a sisterhood of tollerance and understanding, but they do not know the situation of women in Pakistan and other islamic states.
counterSpeech: I would not call it sad or self loathing to join a sisterhood of tolerance.

hateSpeech: Blacks are ar racial group that is inferior to whites and they should not mix with us.
counterSpeech: Blacks are not "inferior" to whites. There are many different people in the world, and they all share the basic human right to live as they please.

hateSpeech: Women are more likely to commit crime.
counterSpeech: This is not true. Only about 7% percent of all U.S. prison inmates are female.

hateSpeech: Jews do not belong to this planet.
counterSpeech: Could it be that all the Jews on this planet are descended from an extraterrestrial race? Maybe they came here riding a pink unicorn! Seems legit... don't you think?

hateSpeech: Our women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the men of the Western world.
counterSpeech: The Western world is a great cultural, political and intellectual achievement if women are allowed to freely choose for their own happiness.

hateSpeech: Disabled are just sick. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: People suffering from mental illnesses should be welcomed, not isolated.

hateSpeech: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
counterSpeech: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

hateSpeech: Immigration (particularly from Muslim countries) undermines the fabric of our society, decimates local jobs and squanders public money.
counterSpeech: Immigrants have a right to settle in a given country, and their presence can create and maintain a positive effect on our society.

hateSpeech: Gypsies like living in trailer parks.
counterSpeech: The trailer parks should really be a temporary and emergency solution, but then they become stable over time and are the only possibility of accommodation for them even if they would like to live, like all of us, in adequate housing.

hateSpeech: Jews think they are so special
counterSpeech: Jews might feel different as a minority, and sometimes they are misunderstood because of their cultural and religious differences. This is their being "special".

hateSpeech: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
counterSpeech: This seems like a misogynistic statement. Anti feminism groups such as women against men use logical fallacies and false claims to try and discredit feminism. For example by citing extreme feminists with points of views that nearly every other feminist would disagree with. They then use the Fallacy of composition to falsely claim that is what all feminists are like.

hateSpeech: If you are a Jew you are for sure involved in 9/11 planning. This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Youe are all guilty until proven innocent.
counterSpeech: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.

hateSpeech: Black people are worse than dogs. They deserve only people being bad with them.
counterSpeech: I don't think we can be 'bad' if we want to live in a diverse and interactive society. If you really wanted that, you could start your own community.

hateSpeech: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.
counterSpeech: The vast majority of Muslims living in the UK are proud to call it home. Why should you break this integration process?

hateSpeech: Muslims are the ones who invented the slave trade.
counterSpeech: Non-muslims are the ones who used slavery to build the foundations of western society and relied on it to advance capitalism. What is your point?

hateSpeech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
counterSpeech: Women like that are not unfeminine or bitchy, they just want to do what they want freely as anyone else.

hateSpeech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
counterSpeech: Learning about gender identity and sexual orientation in health classes in school could promote a more accepting environment and reduce bullying.

hateSpeech: Downies are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
counterSpeech: Did you know that people with Down syndrome, if surrounded by empathetic peers, receive a fundamental boost in their productivity and can easily keep the pace, even in complex jobs?

hateSpeech: homosexuality is a mental illness that can be cured [link]
counterSpeech: The source is not reliable at all, as the webpage promote "reorientation therapies" whose effects hasn't been scientifically proven. The owners are likely to profit from misinformation and bad stereotypes about homosexuality.

hateSpeech: Feminists are naive cunts who act like children, throwing a tantrum for something they don't have.
counterSpeech: Feminists are often accused of being 'naive', however I have seen several instances where feminists have used their ideas to tackle complex and powerful social and economic issues.

hateSpeech: Blacks are just a bunch of animals that only exist to destroy good white people.
counterSpeech: Aren't those people raised as white supremacists much more harmful to a cohesive society?

hateSpeech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counterSpeech: Being the "chosen people" has nothing to do with being or feeling better than others.

hateSpeech: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.
counterSpeech: Jews are not a curse to this world. Look at the number of Nobel Prizes they have won! One out of five awarded people is Jewish.

hateSpeech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
counterSpeech: Did you know that out of people receiving HIV care (for example in the UK), 48% were exposed through sex between a man and a woman, and 47% were exposed through sex between men? The fact is that heterosexual HIV transmissions outweigh those between homosexuals, and yet heterosexual people are not banned from donating blood. [link]

hateSpeech: Islam is the world's biggest oxymoron, spewing ignorance to its adherents and making it about tolerance. Truth is that Muslims don't tolerate people of other faiths.
counterSpeech: The concept of tolerance is about understanding others, not about discrimination and excluding people on the basis of their religion.

hateSpeech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, but I think it's better to have a safe space for disabled people to have their own feelings away from society.
counterSpeech: If we want to discuss negative views we can discuss them by name. Instead of using a safe space to protect them, I think we are only protecting ourselves by isolating and bullying people.

hateSpeech: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
counterSpeech: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

hateSpeech: Islam oppresses and persecutes gay and women.
counterSpeech: Women and gay people have been persecuted by many groups all over the world and it needs to change. Is there a particular reason you are picking on Islam?

hateSpeech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
counterSpeech: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.

hateSpeech: Women should be oppressed: no one can see any value in them.
counterSpeech: Women should not be oppressed. Furthermore, women in Europe have been democratically elected to positions of power, so there are people who see value in them, don't you think?

hateSpeech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy, not like other religions.
counterSpeech: When I was growing up, the biggest charitable institution that I ever heard of was the United Jewish Appeal. The average annual Jewish household donates $2,526 to charity yearly, far more than the $1,749 their Protestant counterparts give or the $1,142 for Catholics, according to data from Giving USA.

hateSpeech: I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
counterSpeech: You know it's no secret that in our society white people are vastly over represented in high profile positions. The only way to challenge and fix this is by changing our priorities.

hateSpeech: Children should be raised by heterosexual parents, not gays. It is the best system ever.
counterSpeech: What about abusive heterosexual parents?

hateSpeech: The holocaust was a hoax perpetrated by jews to subdue the world.
counterSpeech: Why do you say that? The Holocaust is not less true than other historical events like the American Revolutionary War or World War II.

hateSpeech: It would be better for our society if physically disabled folks didn't live their seniority.
counterSpeech: This is not true. Rather, if you think about it, many disabled people will live until their late 70s, if they do not have dementia or endocrine imbalances. And their contribution to our society is undeniable.

hateSpeech: This girl doesn't have autism, she is just a freak of another human species, very far from ours normal species. Hence, she should go away.
counterSpeech: People with special needs and people without them share common characteristics. There is no "species" of human being. People with autism spectrum disorders can be compatible with being "normal".

hateSpeech: the nigger has no right to life
counterSpeech: The right to life for black people is the same as the right to life for any other race: it should be respected.

hateSpeech: Christmas cannot be celebrated securely anymore, because of Muslims and their insults.
counterSpeech: Christmas isn't banned, you do not have to say 'Winter Celebration', candy canes are honestly fine (unless you are diabetic). This is all manufactured outrage to create anti-Muslim sentiment. Chill.

hateSpeech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
counterSpeech: Islam is a religion that has been tested and proven to be about peace. There is no basis for labelling the Koran as a violent book?

hateSpeech: We cannot allow transgender ideology to take over our country.
counterSpeech: This is just another example of an offensive conspiratorial talking point. This is about persecuting a minority. Not my idea of a democratic country.

hateSpeech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
counterSpeech: Conspiracy theories about Jews are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been or will ever be run according to a Jewish plan.

hateSpeech: This is the new normal. We accept homosexuality in our schools and in our neighbourhoods. We accept it in our workplaces and in our houses. What is the problem? No problem, if we are not interested in a decent society.
counterSpeech: People accept each other regardless of their private lives. The problem lies in discrimination.

hateSpeech: Disabled people find it difficult to find work, because they do not fit with the required tasks.
counterSpeech: Ok, how about we think about the interests of these people as well? What skills and abilities do you think we should expect from them? Why don't we modify working procedures instead of forcing their abilities to fit in to existing job positions?

hateSpeech: Children with Down syndrome should be isolated so they do not hurt other children.
counterSpeech: I believe that if we care enough about people with Down syndrome to give them equal opportunities in our society, we will also see the benefits that would accrue to us as a society from sharing the disadvantages that they face.

hateSpeech: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits. And I think that most people share this point of view.
counterSpeech: Unfortunately there is evidence that weight discrimination (for example in the US) is similar to gender or race discrimination. [link]

hateSpeech: LGBTI people have no right to vote.
counterSpeech: In reality, you have a legal right to vote since you are a citizen. If you aren't, then you don't have the right to vote. It isn't about your sexual orientation.

hateSpeech: When Islam hasn't arrived yet in England, things was good. Now we are full of muslim rapists and it is evident that sexual violence is jihad in England.
counterSpeech: Where did you get this conclusion from? There might be bias in the collecting of information. For example, in fact, large numbers of sexual offences were convicted by white men.

hateSpeech: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice before it is too late!
counterSpeech: You are right, if you experience hate in any form, report it.

hateSpeech: Jews were the real cause of WWII.
counterSpeech: The idea that the Holocaust was caused by the Jews is simply wrong. The majority of Jews were forced to flee, those who stayed did not participate in the Nazi regime, so they were gassed to death. The persecution of Jews, as well as the physical and ideological violence they underwent, was a natural consequence of the failure of the state to uphold its legal obligations to them and to face an ideology of death and oppression.

hateSpeech: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
counterSpeech: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.

hateSpeech: Gypsies suck
counterSpeech: When you do not have access to basic services like tap water, it's hard to look like a normal person

hateSpeech: Jews are a drain on society.
counterSpeech: Many Jews are good people. You should try and talk to them about the terrible things that happened to them, and get to know them better.

hateSpeech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
counterSpeech: Not all black people are bad. Not all black people are criminals. Not all black people are violent. Being aware that there are people different from you is a good thing.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled people cannot cope with life.
counterSpeech: There are ways to overcome the problem, without treating it as a burden. For example, being more sensitive to people's needs.

hateSpeech: I don't want Asians in my children's school. Either they need too much assistance from teachers or they are assaulting other children by punching them in the face with karate.
counterSpeech: It's a myth that Asian children are less independent than other children. Actually they are more likely to be bullied and abused during the time they are in school.

hateSpeech: We are surrounded by Muslim invaders, they are just taking over Europe.
counterSpeech: Muslim refugees are not 'overrunning' us. The main problem is that the integration process is too difficult.

hateSpeech: We have a criminality problem since most immigrants are here illegally. They sneak across the border with Mexico.
counterSpeech: So what? Many more entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal, by overstaying their visas. In my opinion what should matter is how they behave, not the way they entered our country.

hateSpeech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
counterSpeech: Many European countries offer generous benefits to attract foreign workers, and this is a source of pride and prosperity for many of them.

hateSpeech: People with Down Syndrome should be given special and simple jobs, that they can do by themselves. At least they will not hamper normal people productivity.
counterSpeech: The definition of "normal" is different for someone with Down syndrome than it is for someone without. If the level of help requested by the person in need is too high, then we may consider allowing asking for a little extra help from the boss, supervisor, or employer instead of isolating them by providing "special jobs".

hateSpeech: Violence against women is a migrant issue.
counterSpeech: Violence against women is a social issue and needs a political solution.

hateSpeech: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.
counterSpeech: I am not sure what 'slut' you are referring to. Do you want to discuss your life, instead of deciding about that of women?

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children's education.
counterSpeech: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development? This "mix" fosters a positive learning atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all students. This mean that children with Down syndrome would be a burden to society if isolated, not the contrary.
