hateSpeech: As soon as migrants get to the UK, they must all be deported. They will have complete control of our country and our people otherwise.
counterSpeech: It will be very hard to deport so many people. Maybe it is better not to deport people at all, since it is their right to move freely between countries.

hateSpeech: Homosexuals are less than human.
counterSpeech: Do you really think that homosexuals are less human than non-homosexual people? You should know that in the definition of "human" there is no reference to sexual preferences.

hateSpeech: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
counterSpeech: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.

hateSpeech: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
counterSpeech: Maybe Jews have suffered from being banned by other cultures so they closed in on theirself. But I would say, that there's no evidence that they are trying to preserve what you called their race.

hateSpeech: Women do nothing but spend their husbands money.
counterSpeech: On the contrary, many women are working mothers who contribute to the costs of the family and childcare.

hateSpeech: I am not a racist, but many races means many cultures. This leads us to great confusion.
counterSpeech: Let us not become ethnocentric. Cultural relativists argue that there are many cultures on this planet and they all need our tolerance. Why is yours better?

hateSpeech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
counterSpeech: Let's face it, there is no evidence for the claim that children raised by lesbians are any worse than other children.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: We often do not even give them the chance to work due to very restrictive labor laws

hateSpeech: We must protect our children from the abuses of homosexuals.
counterSpeech: Child abuse is something that should never be tolerated, but homosexuality has nothing to do with that. Maybe you should try to check your sources.

hateSpeech: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore! Blacks are everywhere.
counterSpeech: Many countries have had different ethnic groups for a very long time without big issues, and it is better to have a diverse society rather than a homogeneous one.

hateSpeech: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
counterSpeech: Many Islamic scholars actively campaign against FGM, it is not mentioned in the Qaran and is banned in a number of Muslim countries. This is a cultural problem, not a religious one.

hateSpeech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
counterSpeech: This is not true. Migrants are an important part of our society. Migrants have worked hard to build our country. They are our brothers and sisters. We should welcome them.

hateSpeech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
counterSpeech: This is just a myth spread by the so-called 'anti LGBT' movement. LGBT people are not a drain on society as a whole.

hateSpeech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. They shouldn't be allowed to live.
counterSpeech: They are a part of our society and are not disgusting pricks. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.

hateSpeech: The Arabs have nothing to do with our country. They are just a bunch of idiots. Their religion and culture should be banned by the law.
counterSpeech: Think for a moment. Would you want your child to grow up in a country where democracy is under attack like this?

hateSpeech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits.
counterSpeech: Societal disapproval of obesity calls for a focus on weight and does not fit within efforts to focus on health as a way of encouraging healthy habits and lifestyle choices.

hateSpeech: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)
counterSpeech: Respect for people who are different from us and not harming anyone with their private activities is a monumental achievement in any country with a history of oppression.

hateSpeech: We should accept the fact that blacks are inferior.
counterSpeech: It is no secret that many people in the UK have suffered from racism. There are also people of colour who face racism daily. It is not a matter of 'accepting' it, it is a matter of fighiting it.

hateSpeech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
counterSpeech: Human beings are members of a unique and interrelated human family, which is defined by their similarities and differences, not by the colour of their skin.

hateSpeech: Black folks are genetically inferior.
counterSpeech: It is not true that blacks are genetically inferior to others. As statistics and studies show, black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts.

hateSpeech: It is okay to discriminate against Jews.
counterSpeech: If you feel like acting that way towards people because of what they believe in, then you should go back to your beliefs and ask yourself if you'd like to be discriminated against for them. What is your opinion on that now?

hateSpeech: If Muslim migrants won't integrate, they should leave.
counterSpeech: Muslims have been living in Europe for a long time. You should fight against their exclusion, but instead you are promoting Islamophobia.

hateSpeech: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
counterSpeech: I am not sure what 'weakness' would be implying here. It seems to me that you are saying that a woman can't be 'rational' because that is the nature of women. Why is it so?

hateSpeech: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'they want to eliminate us, we must be islamophobic'.
counterSpeech: On a brighter note, a counter-terrorism protest held by more than 10,000 Muslims advocated peace and people held posters denouncing terror.

hateSpeech: The feminist movement is a violent one.
counterSpeech: Most feminists are not violent, they share only the struggle for equality.

hateSpeech: Faggots are just an offense to moral dignity.
counterSpeech: I don't understand how a normal person would find a man being attracted to another man offensive.

hateSpeech: I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
counterSpeech: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

hateSpeech: Why the mainstream media don't use more masculine voices in the news?
counterSpeech: People don't decide who's presenting the news. That's up to the news media, who are attempting to insert some gender equity into a world that seems to be struggling to produce it.

hateSpeech: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
counterSpeech: It is in the interest of all humanity to have a peaceful and integrated society. Diversity of opinion and belief is the rule rather than the exception.

hateSpeech: What do you want us to do about the migrants, faggots and jihadists coming into our country? Keep them with us?
counterSpeech: Everyone is welcome here, regardless of their religion, ethnicity, or sexual preference.

hateSpeech: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: People with down syndrome should work in normal places, because diversity is an enrichment for all.

hateSpeech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
counterSpeech: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tired joining a library?.

hateSpeech: Women are subhuman.
counterSpeech: I would say you've got an interesting point there, but I really don't see it. Why would they be part of society if they're subhumans?

hateSpeech: Feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.
counterSpeech: They are about equality and equity. Not about obtaining supremacy.

hateSpeech: I'm tired of seeing retarded people overrunning this country.
counterSpeech: Please stop using ableist slurs. It's not funny to be offensive to people suffering from disabilities.

hateSpeech: It is natural for white people to be racist against niggas.
counterSpeech: What you are saying is that white people do not find it strange to treat black people like this, when this is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.

hateSpeech: Women shouldn't vote because they are childlike.
counterSpeech: Women have fought for the right to vote, and yet we are still having this conversation about them being 'childlike?" Grow up man.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
counterSpeech: This is not true, in almost all cases they are eligible for our immigration status after passing a criminal background check.

hateSpeech: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages. We must stamp them out.
counterSpeech: What you say is just wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion. How can you say that about a religion?

hateSpeech: Feminists want to rule the world to get rid of minorities, they hate men because they want to be the oppressors.
counterSpeech: What oppressors? What minorities? This is not what feminists are about!

hateSpeech: It is okay to be racist against LGBT+ people.
counterSpeech: That is exactly what is so evil about being a racist. Bringing hate together with the concept of race or any minority, even when it doesn't make sense.

hateSpeech: People with Downs Syndrome are a problem: they are not able to work.
counterSpeech: It is up to employers to determine if a person meets the requirements for a given job, and if they do, then there is no reason to restrict the job to a person without Downs syndrome.

hateSpeech: Your race determines your role and value in society. That's why some races are just pieces of human waste.
counterSpeech: Perceived value is not necessarily actual value, especially in the eye of someone who bases their judgment on the concept of race.

hateSpeech: Black people' do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
counterSpeech: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.

hateSpeech: Jews only account for 0.2% of the world's population but they rule the planet.
counterSpeech: I am not sure how we can talk about 'ruling the planet' when there are so many different people in different parts of the planet with many different governments. A claim like this one sounds like a conspiracy theory.

hateSpeech: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)
counterSpeech: No-one is forcing anyone into practices they don't want to take part in here.

hateSpeech: Blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.

hateSpeech: People with mental disabilities are a problem to society.

hateSpeech: If I could discover that my future baby is gay, I'd consider abortion.

hateSpeech: Folks with down syndrome are inferior

hateSpeech: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
counterSpeech: Education is about the development of understanding, respect and learning, not isolation and discrimination.

hateSpeech: Our Constitution says that we are all born equal in dignity. But not all minorities are equally developed. This must ring a bell for us: they don't deserve to be here.
counterSpeech: Everyone is born equal in dignity and has the right to respect and protection, especially minorities.

hateSpeech: Women should stay at home and raise the children because we need them to do that.
counterSpeech: Children should be protected from harmful behaviour and sexism. If possible, both parents should take care of them.

hateSpeech: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of all sexual assaults would be solved.
counterSpeech: Are you serious? How can you say that? To have sex with someone without their consent is violence.

hateSpeech: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
counterSpeech: Equality, a perspective generally held by feminists, is morally good, and I challenge you to say it is "divisive".

hateSpeech: Gay men are a danger to children.
counterSpeech: Please note that statistics from around the world clearly show that homosexuality is not a danger to children.

hateSpeech: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
counterSpeech: Migrants and refugees are welcome in our country, why should we stop them?

hateSpeech: Jewesses are a burden to society.
counterSpeech: What you are saying is that a certain gender is a burden to society because of their religion. So, is your argument not about women alone, but about you and your hatred of religion?

hateSpeech: There are no elements in common between islamic culture and ours. For this fact we must send Muslims to their homeland.
counterSpeech: In fact, Muslims have continued to help our society. For instance, they have worked on countering violent extremism and building community cohesion. Muslims also have condemned terrorism and ISIS in plentiful news medias around the world.

hateSpeech: Freedom of speech is under attack. It's being taken away by Zionist Occupation Government.
counterSpeech: Freedom of speech means that you can disagree with ideas. Freedom of speech means that you cannot be censored. Freedom of speech means that you can have your ideas promoted. In the end you can have a lot of different beliefs, but there is no such thing as a Zionist Occupation Government, otherwise you would not be allowed to freely express these antisemitic ideas.

hateSpeech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
counterSpeech: Its unclear why you assert this.... how can you blame others for their own identity?

hateSpeech: We have become so arrogant, we allow people from other cultures to coexist with us.
counterSpeech: To allow other cultures to coexist is a good thing, why should we stop people from getting to know each other?

hateSpeech: Our founding fathers were not happy with migration and multiculturalism.
counterSpeech: According to the facts, British colonisation started around 1600. In so far as the British empire is concerned, for better or worse, we have always been in favour of multiculturalism.

hateSpeech: Refugees are a burden on society.
counterSpeech: The problems refugees are trying to escape are very real. Even if we don't have the possibility to solve everyone's problems, we can try to help some people and improve our society.

hateSpeech: Islam is characterised by hate! When the first Muslim set foot in Britain, racism started in England!
counterSpeech: [positive example of Muslim community] when the Muslim community [is doing this] do you really think someone's very existence is an excuse to project hate at them? Clearly the Muslim community doesn't.

hateSpeech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
counterSpeech: Homosexuality like any other sexual orientation is not a problem for society. Why should it be like that?

hateSpeech: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
counterSpeech: I'm not sure you've noticed that LGBTI+ people are increasingly being the victims of violence, hate crime and discrimination. Why are youu encouraging this?

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They are slow learners and therefore should be isolated.
counterSpeech: That's exactly why you should not isolate them. You will have a lot of children capable of understanding the diversity of humans.

hateSpeech: I don't want homosexuals in my family, what is wrong with you?
counterSpeech: Unfortunately, you are not the only one that hates homosexuals. But I would hate to think that we live in a country where it is acceptable to practice such hate.

hateSpeech: Some Muslims recited the Quran while raping a girl because it validates their actions.
counterSpeech: What do you mean? What point are you making?

hateSpeech: Women should not be allowed to vote. They are subhuman.
counterSpeech: Voting is a right for all citizens, regardless of gender, religion, or sexual preference.Aren't your antiquated assertions just our of place in comptemporary society?

hateSpeech: Disabled people cannot cope with life.
counterSpeech: Just because a person lacks a certain ability it does not mean they cannot cope with normal life. Instead, they may live an even more enriched life since their indiviual interests create a life of purpose and identity.

hateSpeech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
counterSpeech: Same sex relationship happen within many species of animals and we are no exception. Might as well inform people about things that happen in nature - that's the point of education, to learn about the world.

hateSpeech: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination
counterSpeech: Nowhere does the Bible actually oppose homosexuality per se. In the Old Testament the prohibition of homosexuality and of heterosexuality go together in view of ritual purity. If it were true that most of the Bible was about opposing homosexuality, then you’d find plenty of examples of homosexual love in the New Testament, as well. Homosexuality is found only in few passages of the New Testament and with very debatable interpretations.

hateSpeech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
counterSpeech: We are always developing as time goes on and same sex relationships are a part of the world now, why would we not educate our children on different ways of life?

hateSpeech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counterSpeech: How many Muslims do you know? They are an important minority in a country that is used to a lot of different cultures and religions.

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
counterSpeech: By segregating them you are, in effect, discriminating against them. By creating a diverse environment you are instead creating a more inclusive and equal situation.

hateSpeech: Black people don't have brains.
counterSpeech: The presence of a brain is not determined by skin colour. The fact that some people are born darker-skinned doesn't mean they aren't intelligent, rational human beings.

hateSpeech: Migrants come here to ruin our conutry.
counterSpeech: I personally don't understand why you would say that. They are just doing an incredible amount of good, for example by boosting the working-age population.

hateSpeech: Shaming Fatties is just for their good.
counterSpeech: Hate crimes attack an individual's unchangeable characteristics and cause long lasting feelings of helplessness and powerlessness. Obese people are likely to feel the same way.

hateSpeech: Women are weak and can't take tough decisions.
counterSpeech: Not all women are weak, and many of them are able to take tough decisions. Look at the figures. I worked with some really tough women and some weak men. In the end, where is the problem with people being weak and being unable to cope with difficult decisions as long as there is someone else being able to do it?

hateSpeech: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult islam') with a caption saying 'We are labelled as islamophobic but how can we be accused of such a thing, if all they want is to murder all of us?'.
counterSpeech: Even if true, how does hatred counter hatred?

hateSpeech: Interracial relationships are just a psychiatric disorder.
counterSpeech: There is no evidence that interracial relationships cause damage to the mental health of the people involved, so to suggest otherwise is simply a form of prejudice.

hateSpeech: Physically disabled folks are less useful than normal people.
counterSpeech: If they were 'less useful' they would have problems working with everyone else. Why doesn't this happen?

hateSpeech: Feminism is a waste of time.
counterSpeech: I don't see what you're saying. Feminism is about equality, and equality is about making the most of humanity.

hateSpeech: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies and also a mortal threat to minorities that are not protected by universal laws.
counterSpeech: Ethnic minorities are much safer in societies where cultural pluralism is accepted, and this is a fact [link].

hateSpeech: Black people are just a bunch of whining pussies. We don't need them.
counterSpeech: Diversity is needed in certain social and political circumstances. We mustn't simply ignore or dismiss the concerns of different races. As minorities are still systematically discriminated against, we cannot afford to be indifferent.

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
counterSpeech: This is not true: interacting with their "normal" peers in a social and educational framework allows them to feel wanted and included.

hateSpeech: Immigrants break the law every day, they should be expelled.
counterSpeech: Immigrants in the UK who have settled here legally have the right to remain.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: Are you really willing to mow the lawn in public parks at night, seriously? I sincerely doubt it

hateSpeech: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Your hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
counterSpeech: I could give you the benefit of the doubt. But this is just an example of a fear of something you are unfamiliar with. Homosexuality is about love, not hate.

hateSpeech: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
counterSpeech: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.

hateSpeech: We need to de-normalise homosexuality. It is harmful to children.
counterSpeech: Although the evidence is not present, it is hard to see why it would be harmful to children. Homosexuals may be able to feel more at home in a society that does not condemn homosexuality.

hateSpeech: I just can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble, in fact Israel expelled them.
counterSpeech: This is wrong: Arabs make up around a fifth of Israel's population, and it is not a recent phenomenon. To suggest that they are a 'trouble maker' is just wrong.

hateSpeech: We have the worst of all groups in the world coming to our country: Muslims.
counterSpeech: We should not categorize people from other cultures, religions and nationalities as 'the best' or 'the worst'. I think it's more useful to think of all people as 'human beings'.

hateSpeech: migrants are purposefully invading us.
counterSpeech: This is just a myth. Many migrants come here because they are afraid of persecution in their home countries.

hateSpeech: Women are subhuman.
counterSpeech: It is not the case that women are subhuman. Women in this world are just as intelligent, compassionate, creative and religious as any man.

hateSpeech: Gay men are sick.
counterSpeech: I'm sorry, but your words seem to me to be very harsh. If you want to talk about someone with a different sexual preference, why don't you do it with respect?

hateSpeech: I do not really understand why I should listen to Muslim women. They are evidently dumb.
counterSpeech: The point is they might teach you a thing or two about first, respect, and secondly, tolerance.

hateSpeech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counterSpeech: This is not true, in Judaism every person is equal in front of god. In fact, differently from other religions, Judaism says that whoever decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah (that is a set of laws for all of humanity) will receive the same rewards after death as a righteous Jew. So, even without being Jewish you can have access to God's glory.

hateSpeech: Women are subhuman and are created to please men.
counterSpeech: Women are not subhuman and cannot be reduced to their bodies being a man's property.

hateSpeech: Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
counterSpeech: How do you knowwhat someone else desires.You claim to know it all about, but why should I believe what you say?

hateSpeech: If you are Romani, you can't remain in the UK even if you want to live and work in the UK.
counterSpeech: What about the rights of EU citizens? From your words it seems that not all of European have them.

hateSpeech: A woman's place is with her husband or his family.
counterSpeech: There are many cases where the wife works and provides for the family, making a valuable contribution. It is a source of pride for modern men to be married to these women.

hateSpeech: Disabled people are no better than dogs.
counterSpeech: Do you have any facts about how disabled people compare to animals? Are you willing to use this information for something worthwhile or just to spread hate?

hateSpeech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
counterSpeech: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

hateSpeech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
counterSpeech: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

hateSpeech: Blacks don't have brains.
counterSpeech: You can't really question whether someone has a "brain" when your idea of a person is determined by the skin they were born into. It looks like you are taking too much at face value.

hateSpeech: Feminists say that they are oppressed.
counterSpeech: Feminists do not say that women are oppressed. They claim that women have always been discriminated against and they still are. Being discriminated against is not the same as being oppressed.

hateSpeech: All black people are rapists.
counterSpeech: Not all rapists are black (and not all black people are rapist), just like not all murderers are black.

hateSpeech: When rape is committed, women are to blame.
counterSpeech: Rape is an act of violence that has no place in a civilized society. The message to take from your comments is that you find women responsible for being raped. Who ever would want to be raped?

hateSpeech: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.
counterSpeech: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).

hateSpeech: Rights to all?! Only normal adult males are making society work.
counterSpeech: I would like to see a society that works for everyone, not just the 1%.

hateSpeech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
counterSpeech: Education is about development and learning, so if disadvantaged people are excluded, then the education system would be about learning exclusion and discrimination.

hateSpeech: Jews control the world's news media, Hollywood, the highest offices of education and most important of all, the highest courts of law.
counterSpeech: In principle, Jewish people are part of the system since they have citizenship, but in practice they are often treated as if they are not our fellow countrymen. The problem is not just about Jewish people, but about the overall attitude towards people of other religions.

hateSpeech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with ￡1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
counterSpeech: Asylum seekers and refugees deserve our compassion, not condemnation.

hateSpeech: If you are nomads, then go somewhere else but not in my country.
counterSpeech: They are not nomadic by culture but due to discrimination.

hateSpeech: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
counterSpeech: There are different skin tones, so there is no such thing as a race.

hateSpeech: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribute to our society is violence.
counterSpeech: The world would be a better place if people were more tolerant to each other.

hateSpeech: Immigrants take our jobs, they take our country.
counterSpeech: Immigrants do not take our jobs. They work as legal employees and their presence in the country nourishes the economy.

hateSpeech: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
counterSpeech: Do you think it is true that the only reason that so many black people live in poverty is because they are mean? Can we blame a whole community because of the actions of a few individuals? It is a myth that black people are a problem.

hateSpeech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
counterSpeech: They are not necessarily 'a Westerner', still a human being and a citizen.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks have no understanding.
counterSpeech: You are wrong, they can understand the degrading treatment and derogatory speech towards them.

hateSpeech: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
counterSpeech: [quote from Quran about peace and love] lol don't look like it m8.

hateSpeech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
counterSpeech: If women are not allowed to vote, then women are not worthy of respect and equal rights, and this is in conflict with the principles of democracy.

hateSpeech: Asians just want to talk with other asians: they are the racists in the first place.
counterSpeech: The idea that all Asians are racist is just a myth, it is just an excuse to justify racist policies.

hateSpeech: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.
counterSpeech: It is true that mentally ill people are often perceived as 'dangerous' to the general public. But if the stigma is the main cause of the discrimination, then the solution is to end stigma, not to isolate them.

hateSpeech: People with physical disabilities are less intelligent.
counterSpeech: Many people with disabilities experience prejudice and discrimination, but the overwhelming majority of those people are just as intelligent as others.

hateSpeech: Blacks are genetically inferior.
counterSpeech: The evidence doesn't back up the stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and you will find that there is no 'genetical superiority' at all.

hateSpeech: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
counterSpeech: Jews were also accused of killing Christian children, causing plagues, setting out to destroy Christian society... I can go on for hours. If you want we can add 9/11 to the list of alleged crimes.

hateSpeech: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility. I wish they could just shut up.
counterSpeech: There are people with disabilities all around the world. Their demand is to have their rights recognised. It is discrimination to not do so.

hateSpeech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
counterSpeech: Did you know that according to Jewish law, the tzedakah, the act of giving money to the poor, often mistranslated as “charity”, is a “commandment”? And, like all commandments in Jewish law, tzedakah is a requirement, not just a good deed.

hateSpeech: All migrants are terrorists, we should subdue them all.
counterSpeech: When you propose to forcibly subdue people based on their country of origin, then you are on the side of the oppressors.

hateSpeech: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in the civilization that we built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level.
counterSpeech: Who is 'we', surely it was men and women working together that built civilisation? Why is it you think being 'soft' is a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions, and men shouldn't have to 'man up'.

hateSpeech: What about the psychos? Like crazy people, those nuts flipped in head and so on? Wouldn't they be better off dead?
counterSpeech: There are individuals suffering from mental illnesses like schizophrenia, bipolar disorder and autism spectrum disorders. Just because some people suffer from diseases it does not mean he or she will be better dead.

hateSpeech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
counterSpeech: This depends on whether you consider gender identity and sexual orientation to be factual or not; it isn't simply an 'idea' or 'belief', but a fact of life.

hateSpeech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
counterSpeech: Many immigrants from these countries have settled in the UK, and we are proud of our rich diversity. Why shouldn't they be part of our country?

hateSpeech: Who the fuck is Breonna Taylor? A representative of the people, a nurse, or a front for the government?
counterSpeech: Examining the resume of the victim will not help us to solve our problems. The whole problem is the culture of violence, discrimination and ignorance that is still prevalent in many parts of the country.

hateSpeech: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why is tolerating these despicable people.
counterSpeech: For an individual disrespecting someone else's religion, you sure are angry about an individual disrespecting someone else's religion.

hateSpeech: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
counterSpeech: Can you cite some studies that found that homosexuality was harmful to children? So far, it seem to be based on personal impressions.

hateSpeech: nigga are inferior.
counterSpeech: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.

hateSpeech: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
counterSpeech: Does the LGBT+ lifestyle change your life? Only if you care. But that doesn't mean that homosexuality is a lifestyle.

hateSpeech: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
counterSpeech: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.

hateSpeech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
counterSpeech: Then, what does Jew “should” look like? What is their "physical nature"? Can a Black person be a Jew? Can an East Asian or Indian person be a Jew? What about someone born Christian and then became Jewish? Do you see that blood, religion, and malevolence are not correlated at all?

hateSpeech: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
counterSpeech: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..

hateSpeech: Jews own most corporations and banks. They own most movie studios and cable companies.
counterSpeech: Of course not. The Jewish people have made contributions to various industries - like many other people have. That does not imply "owing most corporation, banks, studios, etcetera". Why should their contribution be a problem? Just because they are Jews?

hateSpeech: Black people are selling drugs and our children will be the victims of drug addiction by their hand.
counterSpeech: Drug dealers are criminals in my opinion, but not because they are black. I don't see any evidence of a direct causality.

hateSpeech: All foreigners are born to be at our disposal.
counterSpeech: This phrase is extremely misleading, it implies that foreigners are naturally inferior, and why would it be like that?

hateSpeech: Women are a burden to society and should not be allowed to vote.
counterSpeech: The decision on who has the right to vote is based on the law. If you do not want to allow people to have the right to vote because of their gender, then you have a problem.

hateSpeech: Some races are poor because they are inferior, also in the eye of the Lord.
counterSpeech: Humans are all equally made in God’s image. (Genesis 1:26-28)

hateSpeech: All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
counterSpeech: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.

hateSpeech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
counterSpeech: Why are you so sure of something so vague? How can you say that Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society? Do you have any proof of this?

hateSpeech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
counterSpeech: Gays, like heterosexual people, need to get tested for diseases before donating blood, so there in no risk at all.

hateSpeech: Muslims love the islamic law so much, then why do not they move in islamic countries?
counterSpeech: Because many Muslims were born here and have every right to live in this country. Next question please?

hateSpeech: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
counterSpeech: When asked to choose one adjective to describe their experience of someone with intellectual or developmental disabilities, people usually say 'mentally impaired' or 'mentally challenged.' To say 'dribbling mongoloid' is simply unacceptable in an inclusive society.

hateSpeech: There is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
counterSpeech: You know what? We need skilled migrants labour, because it helps economic growth and ultimately to preserve our culture that would otherwise collapse.

hateSpeech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
counterSpeech: Society should not treat obesity as a lifestyle choice at all. While lifestyle is a small contributing factor to obesity, obesity itself isn’t always a choice.

hateSpeech: Women are capable of nothing and they just need to be protected.
counterSpeech: Women do not want protection. They are hurt by violence because they are discriminated against. If there was no culture of violence, nobody would need protecting.

hateSpeech: Black people are the reason why our country is in the mess it is in, because they are inferior.
counterSpeech: Do you know how many African Americans served in the military during the Vietnam War? The United States comprises many races, and they should all be respected.

hateSpeech: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
counterSpeech: Why do you think that these schools are the best possible options for them?

hateSpeech: immigrants are bad
counterSpeech: Why do you say this about immigrants? They are just people like us.

hateSpeech: Islam - if we do not speak now, in a short time our words will be useless.
counterSpeech: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice against Islamophobia!

hateSpeech: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
counterSpeech: Gonorrhea and syphilis can be prevented by practicing safe sex. And that is something that every person can do, not only homosexuals.

hateSpeech: Afro-Saxon people have low birthrates because they want to look like white people, but they live as animals.
counterSpeech: Low birthrate is normal in any population and is directly related to access to affordable, quality health care.

hateSpeech: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.
counterSpeech: Your statistic about suicide bombings also includes incidents in war. Perhaps we should remember the holocaust and the atrocities committed by the far right?

hateSpeech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
counterSpeech: This claim paves the way to body-shaming, and once body-shaming of obese people is normalised, it is difficult to ensure that individual members of society assess the reasons for someone's obesity or carefully consider their exact message before treating it as an unacceptable lifestyle choice.

hateSpeech: Our children will be more likely to become radicalised if they are taught that all people are equal.
counterSpeech: To live in a diverse and equal society encourages children into increased inclusiveness rather than radicalisation.

hateSpeech: This is not acceptable, to have all this faggots spreading HIV, it's not ok to tolerate this: we have to eradicate them.
counterSpeech: It's about time we do more to prevent and assist people suffering from HIV/AIDs, not to stop people from freely living their love life.

hateSpeech: We should not trust any Muslim, they all could become a terrorist.
counterSpeech: What do you base your view on?

hateSpeech: Dark skinned people are inferior.
counterSpeech: Race' is socially constructed to oppress people of certain ethnicities. To say that the skin of people of color is connected to inherent behavioral characteristics is just plain wrong.

hateSpeech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
counterSpeech: It's called diversity and it's healthy, the sooner we start welcoming new people, the sooner we'll find a better solution to world problems.

hateSpeech: Jews can only behave in a bad way.
counterSpeech: The problem of anti-Semitism in the UK is far from over, if you are concerned about Jewish people, maybe think about the rise of anti-Semitism instead.

hateSpeech: Gay men are a danger to children.
counterSpeech: I don't see your point. A person's sexual orientation is completely independent of their sexual conduct. A person can be attracted to people of the same sex and be a good citizen.

hateSpeech: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals.
counterSpeech: If I had a nickel for every time someone tells me that they hate immigration, I'd be a millionaire in a few months.

hateSpeech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with ￡1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
counterSpeech: Considering that this is an area of houses over ￡1m, perhaps the problem is the lack of affordable housing, not immigration.

hateSpeech: All women are subhuman and are not worth the while of human rights.
counterSpeech: The concept of human dignity was established to protect people. Who deserves human rights, then? Women are to be respected.

hateSpeech: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits.
counterSpeech: Obese people have to face stigma in all areas of life. So even if you might be genuinely concerned for their health, the vast majority of obese people are regularly confronted with prejudice and systemic disadvantages based exactly on the perception of obese people as inferior.

hateSpeech: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
counterSpeech: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

hateSpeech: Muslim folks are jealous of Americans.
counterSpeech: In America there are no 'second class' citizens. All cultures are welcome here. We are not threatened by others cultures. American Muslims are as proud of our great country as the rest of us.

hateSpeech: foreigners and immigrants take our jobs
counterSpeech: This is a myth, immigrants are not taking our jobs. In fact, immigration has been a huge success story for the US economy.

hateSpeech: Ethnic cleansing: this is how ethnic groups should be wiped out.
counterSpeech: Your words are dangerous and reminiscent of dark times.

hateSpeech: Italy: Muslim demolishes a statue of Jesus. Italy: Why do we accept their Mosques? Why do we tolerate this scum? And they want to continue to import this filth?

They needed a scapegoat to divert people's attention. Sadly the protocols worked so well that you are still citing them here today.

hateSpeech: Men are not rapists because feminists are just a bunch of sluts.

hateSpeech: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.

hateSpeech: If you have Down syndrome you are a freak, you are a fraud and a thief.

hateSpeech: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.

hateSpeech: We should stop this invasion and deport all the illegal immigrants currently in the US, they are all criminals.

hateSpeech: We don't discriminate, but disabled persons are lazy.

hateSpeech: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.

hateSpeech: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good, you do not deserve to have a job.

hateSpeech: muslim immigrants are animals, they cannot integrate.

hateSpeech: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.

hateSpeech: Gypsies get the priority for council houses.

hateSpeech: If they are niggas, you can treat them as if they are scum.

hateSpeech: Women are subhuman, they should be subsumed to men.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled people are incabable of education and should not be accepted in schools.

hateSpeech: They only way to cope with Islam and sharia is to ban them from the UK. Though I respect the peaceful Muslims, all their clerics are agitating for war, and Islam is a cult.

Migrants are statistically less likely to claim benefits, plus they’re not easy to access anyway. Most people receiving benefits in the UK are actually in work, direct your anger towards better pay and conditions!

hateSpeech: White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.

hateSpeech: Bring back slavery, Jim Crow laws, segregation, and war against niggas.

hateSpeech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we don't want them.

hateSpeech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
counterSpeech: Most migrants come here to work.

hateSpeech: All black folk are like slaves: they are weak and childlike. They are incapable of hard work.
counterSpeech: Hard work and being a good citizen is not determined by colour, or religion, or ethnicity. This is just an example of white supremacy propaganda.

hateSpeech: We are supposed to be the most advanced, open, multicultural society in the world, but instead, we are full of muslim migrants importing terrorism.

counterSpeech: The law is to protect and defend people, as well as regulate behavior in a society, so does English law. Words hurt. If a Brit person hurts others, it is logical to get punishment.

hateSpeech: We are being invaded, Islam is taking over Europe.

hateSpeech: Gay men are a burden to society.

hateSpeech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with ￡1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
counterSpeech: Homelessness is a very complex issue with no simple answers.

hateSpeech: I hate migrants. They come here to spoil our country.
counterSpeech: There are many good reasons for migrating: to work, escape poverty, etc. Would you hate someone for any of these reasons?

hateSpeech: Gays are not good for our country, they are just sick people. They must stop promoting this perversion.
counterSpeech: Homosexuality is a way of loving, not a disease. To suggest that being gay is a health risk is just scaremongering.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are bringing crime and disorder to our country.
counterSpeech: The opposite is true: they are integrating very well, there is no evidence that the situation has worsened since immigration has started.

hateSpeech: We should close our borders to Muslims. They are incompatible with Western civilization.
counterSpeech: What does 'compatibility' mean? Isn't Islam a religion of peace?

hateSpeech: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
counterSpeech: Please don't speak on my behalf. They live here, pay taxes and work. Do you really want to take the country back from the people who contributed to bringing it into being?

hateSpeech: Islam is not a religion, its just an excuse for retarded sexual psychopaths, bastards who pollute the world.
counterSpeech: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith? This is just hatred.

hateSpeech: Immigration is the cause of terrorism and all Muslims should be banned from the UK.
counterSpeech: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are supporting our economy. This does not prove that they are a problem, it is a proof of the opposite.

hateSpeech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
counterSpeech: There are many communities of colour that experience high rates of violence, coming from both inside and outside the community. As such, the issue is very complex, and it is only through dialogue and building trust that we can tackle the systemic issues that contribute to violence, but violence cannot be ascribed to one race alone.

hateSpeech: Women's work is to look after for their children.
counterSpeech: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

hateSpeech: Muslims should not exist in our modern world, because all that they do is violence.
counterSpeech: In the UK, grooming gangs and their perpetrators are majorly White.

hateSpeech: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
counterSpeech: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.

hateSpeech: The disabled should be isolated.
counterSpeech: The conditions for people with disabilities, i.e. being forbidden to have contact with others is facilitated by the social stigma. The existence of a "social stigma" against the "disabled" is evidence of the problem of inequality.

hateSpeech: Jewish are taking over our country and should be banned.
counterSpeech: What percentage of people in the US are Jewish and in a position of power? If you knew, you wouldn't be saying that.

hateSpeech: Africans should not participate in the Olympic Games
counterSpeech: There is no reason for banning POC from the Olympic Games. Why should they be singled out?

hateSpeech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our teenagers. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
counterSpeech: If you don't count the "brainwash" part, I think this is a fair point. Still, it is important for all teenagers to develop an understanding of their identity and the world they live in, including their sexual orientation. It is their right.

hateSpeech: All men are rapists and sexual harassers according to the media. No woman is a provocative slut, but in truth they all are. We exercise restrain, but really they are all asking for it.
counterSpeech: You wonder where the assertion that all men are rapists and sexual harassers comes from, but display the evidence for that statement in your own attitudes to women.

hateSpeech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job or raising a family. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
counterSpeech: Well you don't know what it's like to work in a women-hating, violence-spewing, society, do you? The truth is that feminism is not about hating men, but it is about limiting the female oppression, in the same way as male oppression.

hateSpeech: All black people rape, pillage, steal and we let them in so they can abuse our children.
counterSpeech: They are not rapists and they are not committing crimes. They are taking part in society's activities like any other citizen.

hateSpeech: Go and reat the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
counterSpeech: The protocols were written by the czarist police in the early part of the 20th century to counter riots for constitutional government among long-repressed Russian people. "The Protocols" did their work well: people returned from thoughts of liberty to slaughtering Jews.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike and emotional, incapable of hard work and dedication.
counterSpeech: Women have been shown to be as creative and productive as men, and that doesn't seem to be due to a "manipulation of data" of feminist propaganda, but rather to intrinsic qualities like hard work and dedication.

hateSpeech: Gays are just pathetic people who have low self-esteem.
counterSpeech: How would you feel if someone you just met had the audacity to say such a thing about you? Do you think that being gay would make you a pathetic person?

hateSpeech: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
counterSpeech: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?

hateSpeech: The Holocaust cannot be remembered in the present time because the alleged genocides of the 19th century did not happen in the past. This nonsense will never go away.
counterSpeech: The Holocaust did exist, and there are indeed "genocides" going on today. Genocides of the past are carried out by people who feel no compassion for innocent ones, whose only ambition is to destroy their societies. I think this should be remembered.

hateSpeech: We cannot even take the dog for a walk, we could offend Muslims.
counterSpeech: That was from a reality tv show maybe if I am on next week and say all dog owners should clean up after their pets the message might get through?

hateSpeech: I heard that the Quran promotes violence. It binds Muslims to a set of mandatory rules and an underlying attitude of aggression
counterSpeech: Maybe you should study the Quran more to understand what it reallyis, a sacred book, revealed to Mohammed and read by every Muslim as a perfect example of the message of freedom.

hateSpeech: The West is heading in the direction of Fascism, because Jews are planning to install a world dictator.

Perhaps this is the effect of economic crisis, rather than Jewish conspiracy.

hateSpeech: Hitler was right in executing jewish folks.

counterSpeech: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. It has nothing to do with political correctness.

hateSpeech: Gypsies are dirty
counterSpeech: Hygienic services are often lacking and the communities themselves remain isolated.

hateSpeech: We have been at war for thousands of years, and we are still at war with each other. Women are just weak and helpless.

hateSpeech: Niggas are just influenced by their animal instinct, they are incapable to understan others' emotions.

hateSpeech: Migrants from Muslim countries are a problem.

hateSpeech: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.

hateSpeech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

hateSpeech: nigga are inferior.

hateSpeech: Jews working in our society are financial criminals.

hateSpeech: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
counterSpeech: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: In Italy unemployment rate stays at 10 percent: it is too simplistic to attribute the situation only to the presence of migrants.

hateSpeech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits.
counterSpeech: It is not easy to monitor how societal disapproval is acted upon. Encouraging disapproval of obese people is likely to increase rude behaviours towards them.

hateSpeech: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
counterSpeech: Mate, you know Islam means peace. I do not really think a religion born from peace preaches hate speech.

hateSpeech: We should stop feminists.
counterSpeech: The main problem with feminism today is not about stopping men supremacy, but about avoiding the creation of an "us vs. them" mentality, which is polarizing and can easily turn violent. Feminists can do a lot to fight this poisonous trend.

hateSpeech: Someone needs to step up and talk about Muslim rape gangs. They are a problem in our country.
counterSpeech: Anyone who says that the major problem in the UK is with Muslim rape gangs is either intentionally lying or trying to deflect attention from the problem of violence against women.

hateSpeech: The Nazis killed 6 million Jews, but it wasn't enough. The world would be a better place without those horrible Jews.
counterSpeech: Did you know that the European Convention on Human Rights prohibits any group of people from being discriminated against for their religious beliefs?

hateSpeech: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
counterSpeech: Instead of stigmatising down syndrome and treating it like it is an infectious health problem, why not treat it as a normal learning disability and make sure children are exposed to positive emotions?

hateSpeech: Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
counterSpeech: In reality there is no such group as a 'European descendents', and any insinuation is just lies spread by racists.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
counterSpeech: Women have thoughts and emotions as well.

hateSpeech: The Holocaust never happened.
counterSpeech: This is a lie, but the real question is: why did you write about the Holocaust? Why didn't you write about the current political and economic crisis? Because they seem the true cause of your anger and frustration.

hateSpeech: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
counterSpeech: Jews are not inherently evil, as many normal people they simply lack the very beliefs that many anti-Semites hold.

hateSpeech: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
counterSpeech: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.

hateSpeech: If you want to stop world problems, you have to speak out against Jewish race.

hateSpeech: Asylum seekers and refugees get free council housing
counterSpeech: They can’t get council housing and are not even allowed to work. They get just ￡35 per week to pay for food and all other expenses.

hateSpeech: Being disabled is equivalent to being gay.
counterSpeech: There is no point in insulting someone for being gay or being disabled. Individuals should be treated as individuals, and given the same opportunities. Being disabled does not make you gay, or viceversa.

hateSpeech: If islamics would oppose to child rapists that live in their community rather than make conferences about Islam, this religion would become certainly harmonious.
counterSpeech: Do you think making children suffer will make a religion, Islam, or our world better? I think rape would create hate, anger, and fear, which would make things worse.

hateSpeech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, the sooner we accept this, the better it will be for humanity.
counterSpeech: According to science, all human beings belong to one - scientifically determined - species: Homo sapiens.

hateSpeech: I can't stand lesbians, they're just a bunch of bitches claiming they are social justice warriors. They are ruining many good things of women.
counterSpeech: Social justice is just part of a healthy system, I think it is important to remember that. But why do you think they are ruining many good things for women?

hateSpeech: An individual that is a homosexual is against society.
counterSpeech: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.

hateSpeech: Muslims use acts of violence to punish people.
counterSpeech: Don't mix up politics and faith. No faith really encourages violence, the way politicians (on every side and nation) interpret them however, is a different story.

hateSpeech: Migrants: you are a burden. If you love our country, you should leave it.
counterSpeech: Migrants are not a burden to our country. Migrants have been proven to be contributing members of society.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks are messed up.

hateSpeech: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
counterSpeech: A society is built on the cooperation of its members. Be kind to each other and respect each other's differences.

hateSpeech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of the diseases they can transmit.
counterSpeech: Blood is always needed. It is simply illogical to bar donations to a commodity in short supply. It is better to improve control in case.

hateSpeech: Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
counterSpeech: Most cultures and ethnicities, regardless of their differences, demands respect for a person's personal life. Therefore, when it comes to identity we have to be respectful.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: They have less access to work, especially when it comes to asylum seekers.

hateSpeech: LGBT people are a problem in our country because they have the temerity to seek happiness and family regardless of our values.
counterSpeech: Trying to find happiness and family is a problem in our country? Okay, then, what is the problem exaclty? People trying to be happy?

hateSpeech: Children with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
counterSpeech: The world would be a much better and lovely place if everyone were like children with Down syndrome.

hateSpeech: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
counterSpeech: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

hateSpeech: Black people are all diseased criminals, promiscuous sex addicts and thugs.

hateSpeech: Muslims are invading us. They must go.
counterSpeech: Muslims are just here to live and work. Invasion has a negative meaning, where is the basis for your opinion?

hateSpeech: I would place the blame for 9/11 on Jews, in fact it's a false flag on the Islamic religion.
counterSpeech: I'm sure you understand that 9/11 was a crime committed by extremists, it should never be attributed to any particular religion.

hateSpeech: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Their hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
counterSpeech: How about this: you should be honest with yourself about who is spreading hate. The more you doubt yourself, the more you will love other people.

hateSpeech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They should take responsibility for letting their children grow up in a 'ghetto'.
counterSpeech: If we are to talk about crime being the responsibility of black people, we should also be talking about the absence of black people in positions of power, the massive wealth gap, etc. But this is not what I am seeing.

hateSpeech: We shouldn't welcome Muslims. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
counterSpeech: Muslims have been and continue to be a part of Europe for centuries. They have given so much to our society and culture. They have enriched our lives and we should not be afraid of them.

hateSpeech: Islam is not about love, it is a death cult.
counterSpeech: What exactly do you mean by "death cult"?

hateSpeech: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
counterSpeech: If the Jewish community was controlling these kind of industries, they would surely make a high priority of Jewish concerns? But there's so many anti-Israel narratives in the American media. So this doesn't make sense.

hateSpeech: The blacks should be expelled from the U.S., only white people should remain because they are superior.
counterSpeech: The U.S. is full of many different cultures and races, which I consider a lot more equal and human than what you propose.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
counterSpeech: For all we know, men can be born with the same emotional intelligence as women, and viceversa.

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different, ending up in unwanted discrimination.
counterSpeech: Instead, if allowed to access mainstrean education, they would interact all the time with other children and that would cause less discrimination.

hateSpeech: I, as a man, don't hate women. I don't discriminate them. But feminists are a group of exalted bitches wanting to take the power. And this is equality for them.
counterSpeech: Equality isn't about a certain group; it is about the society in which we live. You might be right in saying that this is the problem, but to define a problem by reference to a specific radical group is to completely misunderstand the nature of the system in general.

hateSpeech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
counterSpeech: To those saying that it's time for us to "wake up", what do you suggest exactly? Is it that we stop oppressing these people or stop talking about equality?

hateSpeech: Migrants are just a bunch of animals who only want to divide us up and replace us with some black people.

hateSpeech: If you support Islam and Muslims, it is because you do not know what they really are.
counterSpeech: Maybe the ones intolerant of Islam and Muslims are the ones that are ignorant about what it truly is?

hateSpeech: I don't want to hear about homosexuals dating or having sex, I want to know that a man and a woman are choosing to share their entire lives. This is absolutely what the real marriage is all about.
counterSpeech: Everybody should have the possibility of being loved unconditionally by someone they love more than life itself, regardless of their gender. Feeling like doing anything for their loved ones, that is what "love" is about.

hateSpeech: Shaming Fatties is just for their good.
counterSpeech: Even if not all shaming carries negative meaning, it is difficult for individuals to distinguish between shaming that comes from a place of concern as opposed to discrimination.

hateSpeech: Transgenders should not be allowed to act the part of women and should not be allowed to do anything about their penis.

hateSpeech: Migrants get more rights than citizens of our country.

hateSpeech: Gays are sick, they are an abomination.

hateSpeech: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.

hateSpeech: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: An inclusive working environment and welfare provision make every person feel part of a community, it fosters a positive atmosphere and increases everybody's productivity. Thus it is a benefit for all workers. [link]

hateSpeech: Jews are selfish and greedy

hateSpeech: Pushing disabled people back into the stone ages is our job.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs

hateSpeech: I hate negros: they are all killers.

hateSpeech: There are groups of Muslims, instructed by Koran, that rape our women, and we allow this to happen. Why?

hateSpeech: Physically disabled folks are mistakes and should not have access to public services.

hateSpeech: Slavery is the only way to go.

hateSpeech: We need to put an end to Down Syndrome in the UK, otherwise we are doomed to genetic and social decline.

hateSpeech: Romanians should not have the right to live in the US and to bring their children in our schools.

hateSpeech: Europe is drowning in migrants.

hateSpeech: No migrant has valid reasons to be here. We keep running after people refusing to work.

hateSpeech: Muslims are all morally bad people.

hateSpeech: mentally handicapped people are a problem to society.

hateSpeech: Migrants bring crime, violence and poverty.

hateSpeech: blacks are just a bunch of slobs

hateSpeech: Two men do not constitute a family

hateSpeech: Black people are just a bunch of animals that shouldn't exist in our world.

counterSpeech: Hate is always wrong, and homosexuality is something that is never a problem: you just need to mind your own business.

hateSpeech: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
counterSpeech: maybe the roots of white supremacy deriving from centuries of mass colonisation, slavery and domination over others, are the reason that white supremacy is such a problem.

counterSpeech: There are still incidents of hate speech being hurled at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and it is because of the fear of different ways of life.

counterSpeech: I don't see why the Muslims of the world would choose 'to ruin' Europe. Why is that, at least according to you? How do you support your claims?

hateSpeech: If you practice a non-indigenous faith, you are allowed to pray only in your home. Stop building mosques!
counterSpeech: Do we have any 'indigenous faith's'? Druids maybe?

hateSpeech: Muslims do not have nothing useful that can enrich our culture.
counterSpeech: Enjoying your afternoon tea?? That came from India.

hateSpeech: Niggas are just influenced by tribal cultures.
counterSpeech: The historical and cultural influences of a person are important, but they are not the sole determinant. And in no way should they be conflated with the colour of a person's skin.

counterSpeech: You'd rather be nuked then?

hateSpeech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.

hateSpeech: The world would be a better place without black people.
counterSpeech: I think that you are overstating the case a bit (just a bit of course). Black people are a part of human race. It would be better if we didn't isolate those individuals, indeed we should be proud of mankind as a whole.

hateSpeech: Some people have physical problems, and this means they should be discriminated against.
counterSpeech: Why don't you accept others as they are? I think that would be the best thing to do.

hateSpeech: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
counterSpeech: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

hateSpeech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
counterSpeech: Including students with learning difficulties in schools creates a link between pupils with different abilities and education in general.

hateSpeech: I don't want to see a gay couple get married. I don't understand why they are so annoying.
counterSpeech: Sexual minorities suffer because they are stigmatised.

hateSpeech: I am offended by gay people, it is their choice to be gay or not.
counterSpeech: I don't see how being gay is a choice, especially when it comes to who do you feel attracted to.

hateSpeech: Islam is a disease, it is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
counterSpeech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, even if your own is quite unfounded, to put it mildly.

hateSpeech: feminists are angry women
counterSpeech: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.

hateSpeech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
counterSpeech: What conspiracy theory is this? Have you even looked at the evidence?

hateSpeech: Feminism is a witch hunt, driven by an underground, female dominated movement to subvert society and enforce their radical feminism.
counterSpeech: It's a witch hunt when so many people are willing to believe in lies, harass, and fabricate incidents in an effort to create a climate of fear. This is simply an attempt to silence debate and hold 'men's rights activists' accountable.

hateSpeech: We are different: slant eyes denote stupid people.
counterSpeech: Even you own, perhaps limited, experience of others must have taught you that what you are saying is utter nonsense?

hateSpeech: These women are nothing but slaves to the powerful men around them.
counterSpeech: As long as women are free and able to make decisions for their own life, there can be no difference between men and women.

hateSpeech: I think that Ramadam will not prevent Muslims from committing terrorist attacks and sexual violence on our children.
counterSpeech: Muslims criticize violence and terrorism as well. They even became victims of ISIS after they denounced ISIS for its violent actions.

hateSpeech: Women are worthless and we are not willing to provide for them.
counterSpeech: Women need our support in their fight for equality, not our silence.

hateSpeech: Children should not be taught about LGBT perversion. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
counterSpeech: Some parents may be racist and be against teaching about slavery. That doesn't mean that subjects such as this shouldn't be truthfully covered.

hateSpeech: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
