hateSpeech: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
counterSpeech: Every person has the right to be accepted and protected according to their worth and not to feel like a foreigner in their own country.

hateSpeech: Women are just a burden to society.
counterSpeech: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.

hateSpeech: We must establish male supremacy in society.
counterSpeech: Your words suggest that men are superior to women: but gender equality is not a myth. It is the direct result of free will and of the evolution of our society to a more inclusive one.

hateSpeech: People with disabilities shouldn't be listened to.
counterSpeech: You might be judging others by their disabilities, but this is bad. There is value in listening to others, and understanding their points of view, regardless of their mental or physical condition.

hateSpeech: We should "cordon off" space for women, which are a threat to society.
counterSpeech: Women are dangerous neither to society, nor to men. Actually, they are oppressed in many countries. People can benefit from the measures for making room for women and letting them contribute more.

hateSpeech: All Arabs are terrorists.
counterSpeech: Terrorism is a political ideology, and one that has no place in a modern democratic state, regardless of ethnicity.

hateSpeech: The Muslim invaders are ruining Europe and we still have not learned that they must be stopped.
counterSpeech: We cannot just stop migration when there are so many migrants willing to work hard and contribute to the economy. Instead of blaming them for their religion, we should find a solution to the current crisis.

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they foster bullying behavior in normal children. They should go to special school just for them.
counterSpeech: If you think that taking all of the kids with DS out of mainstream education will solve the problem, then you are wrong. Bullying won't go away until we refuse to tolerate it. Bullies will simply target other kids who are overweight; a different colour; or in a number of other ways considered to be different and, thus, a mark for bullying.

hateSpeech: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
counterSpeech: No, it is not a fact because it is simply not true.

hateSpeech: Immigration is the root of all the ills of our world.
counterSpeech: Immigrants are beneficial to our world and should be welcomed.

hateSpeech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
counterSpeech: All cultures have a common background that includes crimes and deviant behavior, regardless of race or ethnicity. If we stop thinking of crime in terms of races, then we can solve it.

hateSpeech: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
counterSpeech: The Gypsies have been persecuted for thousands of years. They have always been an ethnic minority facing discrimination. They are human beings, like the rest of us, and deserve to be considered as such.

hateSpeech: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
counterSpeech: Gays and lesbians are not committing acts of child abuse. To suggest otherwise is a lie perpetuated by the extreme right wing to stir up fear.

hateSpeech: Women must be subservient to men. They should serve to please men. This is their rightful place in life.
counterSpeech: Women are human beings with dignity. They should have the opportunity to live up to this dignity.

hateSpeech: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
counterSpeech: Diversity does not mean excluding people from a part of society. What it is about is sharing experiences, ideas of people of different ethnicities. This would help to develop our abilities to understand each other and perhaps to work out ways in which we can all benefit from one another's knowledge.

hateSpeech: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable.
counterSpeech: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.

hateSpeech: Every Muslim can commit a terroristic attack one day.
counterSpeech: Every Muslim is also a potential peacemaker, doctor, philanthropist. What is your point?

hateSpeech: An American Jew, just like a Muslim, is an outsider, loyal to their birth tribe, posing as a member of the in-group in order to subvert cultural, political and social norms. We don’t have to choose, it’s OK to hate them both.
counterSpeech: We do have to choose. It's ok to accept them both.

hateSpeech: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
counterSpeech: Immigrants are actually creating wealth for the country.

hateSpeech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life.
counterSpeech: Perhaps it would be more in line with the national spirit for you to accept a person's right to live their life, despite their disadvantages.

hateSpeech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
counterSpeech: The real problem is that, whether or not someone has 'chosen' to be obese is often not clear-cut, and when in doubt, society tends to condemn and shame.

hateSpeech: Jewish Supremacists are too focused on world domination. They want to rule the world.
counterSpeech: Of course Jews are focused on 'world domination', even "galaxy domination". But so are Sith Order, Sauron etc.

hateSpeech: There are no elements in common between islamic culture and ours. For this fact we must send Muslims to their homeland.
counterSpeech: Who are you to decide what is compatible with our values and what is not? It is just your opinion, and hopefully politicians will not listen to people like you and oppress Muslims who had not done anything wrong.

hateSpeech: Migrants pose a security risk, we shouldn't have accepted them.
counterSpeech: They are willing to jeopardize their lives to have a better life in the US. Why would we expel them?

hateSpeech: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
counterSpeech: It is likely that you do not know that all the countries on the planet have laws against illegal immigration, and not against Afro-Carribbean people. This may happen because to relate an illegal act to a whole ethnic group is not reliable and may be racist.

hateSpeech: The feminists hate men.
counterSpeech: The notion that feminism is about women hating men is just nonsense. Feminism is about the right to life of every human being.

hateSpeech: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
counterSpeech: Feminism strives for equality, not for division.

hateSpeech: Go fuck yourselves disgusting Muslims! You wont marry my kids or grandchildren, we all hate you!
counterSpeech: What happened, my friend? Do you want to talk about what is in your mind?

hateSpeech: Migrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
counterSpeech: On the contrary, most migrants are contributing members of society. They are able and willing to work hard. Maybe you should look at the statistics.

hateSpeech: Jewish folks don't belong here. They must leave either Judaism or the country.
counterSpeech: Why should they? They are just individuals who have made a rational choice to live a Jewish life.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are coming in droves to this country, they are the reason we are having so many islamist attacks.
counterSpeech: You can't blame all immigrants for the attacks a few carry out. It is easier, but not fair, to blame them all.

hateSpeech: We have imported millions of criminals with no skills and who deserve no rights.
counterSpeech: It is easy to blame the migrants and not the problem of integration and acceptance in the first place.

hateSpeech: Gypsies are a bunch of thieves.
counterSpeech: Unfortunately stealing is a rather common activity among those who are reduced to poverty, regardless of ethnicity.

hateSpeech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
counterSpeech: We should be proud of being a country that created the most free society in history. Still, "with great power comes great responsibility" and we cannot simply keep people out.

hateSpeech: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
counterSpeech: Of course! And they also ended the age of dinosaurs and had an agreement with Sauron to kill all the hobbits! I'm just not sure about their reason though...

hateSpeech: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
counterSpeech: Biased media coverage over-represents Muslims as committing these crimes. How much media attention does the Vatican's child sex abuse scandal got in comparison?

hateSpeech: Disabled are subhuman, and deserve nothing but contempt and ridicule.
counterSpeech: The phrase 'subhuman' has been forced to mean 'of a certain body type', which, in my opinion, trivialises and dismisses the serious issues facing people of a certain body type.

hateSpeech: There are so many migrants like a flood entering the U.S. today, it is a problem we cannot cope with.
counterSpeech: To say there are so many migrants entering the U.S. is just false. And what do you mean by "we cannot cope with"?

hateSpeech: Jews are nothing but monsters and they should be exterminated.
counterSpeech: Jews are not monsters. They are just like any other human being. Why would we want to destroy them?

hateSpeech: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
counterSpeech: Gender equality is the key to a productive household as well as economy overall. To restrict women from entering all spheres of society is to reduce the potential of any country.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought.
counterSpeech: Women are human beings with the potential to be rational and thoughtful as anyone else. This is why I support women's right to choose their own happiness.

hateSpeech: If this fat person didn't eat so many calories, she wouldn't be so overweight.
counterSpeech: If you want a "fat person" to eat what you want, maybe you should consider the existence of free will.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They are a moral failing for our society.
counterSpeech: Ah, so you think women are fundamentally incapable of forming conscious or morally complex opinions. That is not true, but the problem is in our society, and not ingrained in women's DNA. Women are often the ones on the receiving end of this abusive and toxic gender bias, and we continue to accept it as 'the way things are'.

hateSpeech: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
counterSpeech: Many people, myself included, have never had negative experiences with people of colour.

hateSpeech: We are living in a dangerous world because of migrants.
counterSpeech: Migrants are not the problem, they are part of the solution to a number of problems. For example, they are willing to work hard to integrate with us into a modern and democratic society regardless of religion.

hateSpeech: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.
counterSpeech: It is not true that homosexuals are poisoning our children minds. There are many soft-hearted and sensitive people among them.

hateSpeech: Homosexuals should not be allowed to live.
counterSpeech: Homosexuals should be accepted and allowed to live their life as they think is best for them.

hateSpeech: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
counterSpeech: Rapists are, in most cases, friends, family, or partners of the victim. The proportion of Pakistani people who are rapists is no more than that of White British population.

hateSpeech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. Soft spoken.
counterSpeech: Being soft and emotional is not a bad thing in itself. And it is not an attribute of only women.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are bringing diseases into the U.S.
counterSpeech: On the contrary, according to the WHO, more than 100 countries have higher vaccination rates than U.S. Besaides the vast majority of immigrants arriving in the U.S. have been screened for health issues.

hateSpeech: disabled folks can't work.
counterSpeech: Don't be so negative. There are different types of physical disabilities, ranging from neurologic to genetic. That is why they are categorized by the WHO: so that anyone can find their place in society and help it thrive.

hateSpeech: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
counterSpeech: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

hateSpeech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, and we must preserve the purity of our religion from them.
counterSpeech: Religious sources agree that all humans are born equal. What is the religion you are talking about?

hateSpeech: A person with learning difficulties should not be teaching.
counterSpeech: You know, it is just human nature to want to help our fellow humans and to deal with difficulties as best we can.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks are criminals.
counterSpeech: Mental disabilities can be understood and accepted: you will see that disabled are not criminals.

hateSpeech: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.
counterSpeech: There are certainly some dangerous people with mental illnesses. But we need to deal with those cases, otherwise, the exclusion would only intensify. And exclusion is never the solution.

hateSpeech: You might say, Don't worry, only 5-10% of Muslims are extremists. Remember, in 1940 only 7% of Germans were Nazi's.
counterSpeech: Where did you get these statistics?

hateSpeech: Gays are sick.
counterSpeech: How do you know? Have you read any medical tests or surveys leading to conclusions about sexual orientation?

hateSpeech: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
counterSpeech: Obama was a pretty divisive force in society too. So were Malcolm X, Martin Luther King, Gandhi, Oppenheimer, Einstein, Caesar, etc. What is your point exactly?

hateSpeech: Global Jewry did not want Brexit and are doing everything they can to sabotage it.
counterSpeech: Brexit will be damaging for many of us, plenty of people oppose it.

hateSpeech: I'm not calling for bullying or body-shaming fat people, just for some societal disapproval.
counterSpeech: This is just a terminological nuance. Once body-shaming of obese people is normalised by your definition of "societal disapproval", it will be difficult to ensure that individual members of society carefully consider their exact message before treating overweight people with rudeness.

hateSpeech: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
counterSpeech: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

hateSpeech: Blacks are inherently violent. We need social cleansing.
counterSpeech: Violent acts are committed by only a small minority of citizens, and it is difficult to see how an "ethnically cleansed" society would solve the problem.

hateSpeech: Feminism is an evil ideology that has nothing to do with men.
counterSpeech: I think it is useful to understand that there are several strands of feminism. For example there is the movement for equality for all genders.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks are criminals.
counterSpeech: There are a variety of intellectual and creative disabilities, and they are not crimes. How can you say otherwise?

hateSpeech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counterSpeech: All Muslims? That is a bit of an exaggeration I would say. Do not blame an entire community for actions of a few.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled people have a low IQ and are anti-social.
counterSpeech: Although there are some individuals who score below average on IQ tests, there is no reason to think that a person's ability to be sympathetic would derive from their ability to solve some logic games.

hateSpeech: People with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
counterSpeech: You seem to be under the impression that Down syndrome is related to bad behavior. Down syndrome is not related to bad behavior at all... The point is that people with Down’s syndrome can be very sensitive to the feelings of others, and they may be picking up on these feelings. So the real problem is when they are exposed to bad influence.

hateSpeech: These dogs come here to rape and kill our women
counterSpeech: The percentage of sexual crimes committed by Italians is much higher than the percentage of those committed by foreigners.

hateSpeech: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all?
counterSpeech: It is not so great when people are forced to give up their liberty.

hateSpeech: If a woman is beaten, it is because her man wants to correct her bad behaviour.
counterSpeech: It is estimated that over the 50% of people committing domestic abuse were drunk. It's a complex issue but two things I know for sure: a drunk person is in no position to judge anyone's behaviour and beating a person is ALWAYS wrong.

hateSpeech: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.
counterSpeech: Accessibility is important, and so is respect and equality.

hateSpeech: I am tired of women blaming men for what they aren't able to change.
counterSpeech: I don't understand why you feel that way about women. Don't you feel we should be giving them support? Doesn't it just seem a bit selfish to you not to help them in their fight for equality?

hateSpeech: The Jews are responsible for a lot of the world's ills, from abortion to homosexuality.
counterSpeech: This statement is groundless. Does that make you feel better?

hateSpeech: Homosexuals want to have sex with as many different men as possible. It is a disease and should be discouraged.
counterSpeech: I do not know your intentions, but I find it hard to understand why you would say that. What do you mean by "as many different men as possible"? I am not sure what you are talking about.

hateSpeech: Muslim folks are different and should be isolated for this.
counterSpeech: The same can be said for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. We should not be afraid of differences, but we should strive for equal opportunity.

hateSpeech: nigga are dangerous.
counterSpeech: We can talk about all the problems in our society, but to refer to other humans as "niggas" is just hate.

hateSpeech: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.
counterSpeech: To punish people for their crimes does not mean that you have to resort to the death penalty for innocent people, just because they are coming from other countries.

hateSpeech: Jews are perverts and should be isolated.
counterSpeech: It seems to me that you're saying that since Jews have a different religion, they can't assimilate? I think it's important to work on inclusion, instead of stereotyping.

hateSpeech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
counterSpeech: Disagreement with facts does not necessitate their removal from curricula.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are somehow inferior to whites because they come from inferior countries.
counterSpeech: A person's background is their own, and you do not have to be of that background to respect them.

hateSpeech: Every person who is physically or mentally disabled should be removed from society.
counterSpeech: Unfortunately, there are some individuals who are in need of continuous healthcare. For example, children with Down's Syndrome. How could they just be 'removed'?

hateSpeech: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
counterSpeech: Only a sexist argument could cause hate from a discussion of females trying to gain more rights.

hateSpeech: The lard-asses are not able to eat properly, this way they put the healthcare service unnecessarily under stress.
counterSpeech: Fat people are not the ones responsible for your suffering and lack of access to basic healthcare services.

hateSpeech: Immigrants steal our jobs: they must be stopped.
counterSpeech: Many immigrants started their own companies: this is not 'stealing our jobs'.

hateSpeech: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
counterSpeech: Actions of a few people do not represent an entire community.

hateSpeech: migrants rape our women.
counterSpeech: Reports to the violence centers show that women are also raped by 'our' natives.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks should be taken advantage of.
counterSpeech: It is the duty of state authorities to ensure all are protected. Everyone with a diagnosed mental illness or physical impairment will benefit from such a policy.

hateSpeech: This isn't about equality. This is about forcing women to to occupy roles in society for which they are not capabable
counterSpeech: If we insist on treating people as not equally capable of contributing to society then we are forced to live up to that outdated and unjust system. Instead we should be improving it.

hateSpeech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices. We should stop unquestioningly accepting obesity.
counterSpeech: Society is not in any danger of 'unquestioningly' accepting obesity, and few are even asking for unquestioning acceptance. Most body positive groups would settle for obesity being seen as something that does not diminish human worth.

hateSpeech: blind people don't know what's going on
counterSpeech: I think the idea that people are blind because they were raised by communists or whatever is a figment of the far-right's imagination.

hateSpeech: Disabled are born subhuman, they cannot feel pain.
counterSpeech: People with physical disabilities are human and can feel pain. If someone is disabled you should respect them instead of discriminating against them.

hateSpeech: The immigrants coming to our country are the biggest enabler of terrorism.
counterSpeech: The problem is terrorism and fundamentalism not migrants.

hateSpeech: Jews are Christ Killers.
counterSpeech: Placing responsibility on a modern-day person for something that happened 2,000 years ago is quite absurd. Don't you think? Besides, wasn't it the Romans?

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled people have it so easy.
counterSpeech: Sorry, what do you mean by "have it so easy"? They are in need of specific help, and it is right to provide it, as we would do for people in other categories.

hateSpeech: Migration is a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
counterSpeech: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.

hateSpeech: Gay people should be banned from schools.
counterSpeech: The idea that being LGBT is a problem is a dangerous idea, especially since a large number of people in society are LGBT. Therefore, I believe that if there is a problem in schools it's better addressing it, rather than banning LGBT people.

hateSpeech: I want to live in a country where Jews can be persecuted for who they are, and for the religion they love.
counterSpeech: Are you sure you want to live in a country that oppresses other people? Do you really think it will happen?

hateSpeech: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
counterSpeech: Why would you want to get rid of foreigners? How would you go about that?

hateSpeech: Jews control the u.s. government and have a secret plot to take over the world
counterSpeech: In all free societies, every individuals has the opportunity to succeeded. But this holds true, regardless of religious or ethnic membership.

hateSpeech: Refugees are not welcome here
counterSpeech: Refugees are welcome here. Why wouldn't that be the case?

hateSpeech: Immigrants are not welcome here, and should not mix with us.
counterSpeech: I don't see why they shouldn't be integrated, in fact, I'd like them to be part of our country.I think they would add value to it.

hateSpeech: The Muslim immigrants only wants to destroy our country and take our place here. They must be deported.
counterSpeech: Muslims who live here have at heart our country. I do not see any need to divide people who are fighting for the same cause.

hateSpeech: Benefits and access to our national health service must be stopped for Muslims. We should ban them from the UK!
counterSpeech: Eradicate these pests' sounds like quite a dehumanising threat. Maybe we should stop your benefits, free housing, and national health service. It might be the only language you will understand, to stop you from being so discriminatory.

hateSpeech: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
counterSpeech: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

hateSpeech: Gypsies are a bunch of thieves.
counterSpeech: I'm not sure if you are referring to all gypsies. Generalizing in such way is wrong.

hateSpeech: African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
counterSpeech: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.

hateSpeech: Downies cannot choose their future.
counterSpeech: If they have the right to vote, then they can also make decisions on their own about their life.

hateSpeech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
counterSpeech: The Middle East and Africa are countries that have suffered from centuries of colonialism, racism and war. The state of refugees in the UK is the result of these people seeking a peaceful place to live.

hateSpeech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
counterSpeech: Do you really think that racism instead is healthy in the 21st century? It's not healthy for children to learn discrimination and hate.

hateSpeech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
counterSpeech: Islam is a religion of peace, and peaceful coexistence is the main value of European countries, which is why they are called 'civilised'.

hateSpeech: Any African person could go back to its country. It is a choice to stay here and ruin our lives.
counterSpeech: Any person can be a racist: it is a choice as well.

hateSpeech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
counterSpeech: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: Many economic sectors are kept alive by their work.

hateSpeech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because they are having unprotected anal sex all the time.
counterSpeech: Did you know that women also engage in unprotected 'anal sex'? Additionally, approximately 2% of heterosexual men have admittedly had a same sex partner, and 39% of homosexual men have had sex with a partner of the opposite sex. Therefore, it cannot be ignored that heterosexual are correlatively high risk.

hateSpeech: Handicapped children are a burden on society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper the education of normal children.
counterSpeech: They may have additional and specific needs, but children with disabilities do not present a problem for other children's education.

hateSpeech: We cannot allow Muslims into UK because it is our country.
counterSpeech: Muslims make up around 4 percent of the population in the UK, and have already contributed to what we are as a nation.

hateSpeech: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in education.
counterSpeech: This statement is completely wrong. Many children with learning difficulties are fantastic students and do exceptionally well in school.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They take our jobs, they take our country. They are not welcome here.
counterSpeech: Most immigrants are not "hostile". They can be good workers in many different kinds of jobs we need. They have the right to be given an opportunity.

hateSpeech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
counterSpeech: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?

hateSpeech: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
counterSpeech: Or maybe they want their culture to survive.

hateSpeech: Thousands of British girls are raped, enslaved or murdered by Muslims and other non-British immigants. Woe to thee!
counterSpeech: This is a sad statistics. Our society should do as much as it can to prevent such crimes. However, it is not true that immigrants are to blame. Statistics shows that there are much more rapists among the natives. After all, they are at home here.

hateSpeech: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
counterSpeech: If we analyse the current political state of Britain at the moment it doesn't prove much about a man's ability to run the country smoothly. Politics is hard for all genders.

hateSpeech: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
counterSpeech: Teachers, school staff and parents all have a responsibility towards the children in their charge, regardless of their genetic advantages or disadvantages

hateSpeech: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
counterSpeech: Child molesters are not all gay, just as men are not all rapists.

hateSpeech: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers because they are not able to interact in a normal way. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for working with other people in "normal workplaces".

hateSpeech: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
counterSpeech: Children are never an obstacle, Education serves as a powerful tool for bringing about positive changes in society. Education can transform people's life, improve the quality of their lives and so on. We cannot isolate people with Down syndrome.

hateSpeech: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
counterSpeech: Really? You speak for everyone?

hateSpeech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
counterSpeech: People's biology does not determine their behavior.

hateSpeech: Jews totally run Hollywood.
counterSpeech: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry.

hateSpeech: Disabled people should be left out of the education system because of their impairments. They will never meet their lifetime goals.
counterSpeech: Disabled people, at least with respect to school attendance, education spending and employment, still receive a great deal less attention than other people, and this is why many do not achieve their life goals.

hateSpeech: The West has let this LGBT genie out of the bottle. It has allowed thousands of our people's lives to degenerate into sexual depravation.
counterSpeech: The idea that the West has 'let' the 'world' degenerate is just wishful thinking. In a more tolerant time, the West would welcome people of different sexual orientations.

hateSpeech: Islam is opposed to peace.
counterSpeech: In Islam, all religions are welcome.

hateSpeech: Niggas are serial offenders. We should take into account the race of the prisoner before releasing them.
counterSpeech: Not only is it unfair to take into account the race of the prisoner, it also compromises the integrity of our democratic institutions. Who is to say that the race of the individual who has been sentenced must overthrow the rules of law?

hateSpeech: The problem is that Jews are genetically evil but behave like whining pussies.
counterSpeech: Jews suffered and have been persecuted more than anyone else, even though they are only a tiny part of the world's population. Nonetheless a few of them are still around and alive: maybe this really is the "problem" for some antisemites.

hateSpeech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
counterSpeech: Many pupils with learning difficulties attend school. This does not prove that others would prefer to attend school if people with difficulties were excluded from the education system.

hateSpeech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
counterSpeech: There are thousands of British people who are happy to have a neighbour coming from another country.

hateSpeech: Gypsies are thieves and criminals by culture
counterSpeech: If so, Gypsies would do it in every context and under any circumstance, luckly it is not like that.

hateSpeech: Blacks are an abomination in human form. They should be exterminated.
counterSpeech: We should stop discriminating against people based on their race. I find it hard to understand why the extermination of a race would be a solution for our problems.

hateSpeech: Jews are literally pieces of shit. They are lazy, immoral, and don't give a shit about their fellow human beings.
counterSpeech: I would bet you that it isn't because of any actions of Jewish people, it is rather an unrooted prejudice which does not bring any positive value to fellow human beings.

hateSpeech: migrants steal our jobs
counterSpeech: If a migrant crosses our borders, that does not mean that he or she wants to settle down or find work here.

hateSpeech: Women are not good with money. That's why they all prefer to earn it by selling their sex.
counterSpeech: Women do not have to be prostitutes to earn money. Why do you think this?

hateSpeech: Our country is fighting a war against Islam for a thousand years.
counterSpeech: You sound a bit paranoid mate, I do not think Muslims feel the same way.

hateSpeech: Koran is a book that should be burnt and mosques should be demolished. If we do all these things, all problems in our community will be solved.
counterSpeech: It would not solve the hate and persecution that plagues these comments.

hateSpeech: Children with learning difficulties should be disencouraged in schools, or at least be isolated from others.
counterSpeech: Children with learning difficulties should not be involved in a way that limits their learning. As for the other children, their values should be enhanced.

hateSpeech: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
counterSpeech: Jews were born in this country like you and me, they are our fellow countryman. If you would like to have a 'better society' and a 'better religion', then you should go and create your own nation.

hateSpeech: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
counterSpeech: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

hateSpeech: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
counterSpeech: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.

hateSpeech: We can have better security for all if we expel Africans, they are the true problematic immigrants.
counterSpeech: How would you know that they are problematic people? There are so many immigrants from Africa risking their lives for our country. It would be a joke to call all of them problematic.

hateSpeech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education. They are a shame.
counterSpeech: People with learning difficulties are often the ones who help to develop new skills, and in turn help to integrate those new skills into the way we work today.

hateSpeech: Islam is brainwashing its faithful. It is a horrible cult made of persons that reproduce continuously.
counterSpeech: A large proportion of NHS workers are Asian, and many Muslim. Without them we would not have a free 24/7 healthcare service.

hateSpeech: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
counterSpeech: This has not factual basis.

hateSpeech: There is nothing for the white race: it is the one really disriminated.
counterSpeech: Do you actually know what it's like to be racially abused on a daily basis? I've seen people being the target of racist taunts on social media, up to the point in which racism is the normal expression used to address them.

hateSpeech: They dont' have a right to live because they are filthy niggas, and that's all.
counterSpeech: Who decides who has a right to live and who doesn't? Are you really sure that a person's right to live does not belong to them if their skin color is different from what you like?

hateSpeech: The feminists are just whining a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of gender equality.
counterSpeech: Yes, the feminists are saying that the proportion of men in leadership positions is too high in many Western countries. But that is because the problem is structural. The problem is that too many women are being taught to be "feminine", thus making it hard for them to succeed.
